For more than 2 years, she has been running a grocery store. She has always been in business, and in the beginning she had a restaurant in the central district of the city. However, she had to close this because it did not generate enough income. Now, with this new business, which is located right in her house, she sells grocery staples along with soft drinks and sodas. To make her customers comfortable she has tables and chairs so that the can sit and consume any of her products in peace. Her sons help her to serve the customers, but what she most wants is to have more products that are in demand by her customers. For the future, she is thinking of opening a restaurant again. She was invited by one of her neighbors to join this loan group within the microfinance organization MFP and it seemed to her to be a great opportunity to improve her business and she is very grateful for this and so she is committed to making her repayments on time. She will use the money she is requesting to buy more groceries for her store.

loans.use: to buy staple goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Adelayda

texts.es: Adelayda de 39 años, vive en el municipio de Somotillo, Allí tiene un negocio que es una pulpería. Su idea emprendedora surgió cuando decide invertir en este negocio por unos ahorros que tenia, persistente ha logrado que su actividad  crezca gradualmente hasta convertirlo en la fuente de ingresos con los que su familia cubre sus necesidades diarias. Su mayor desafío es el capital de trabajo insuficiente para lograr hacer una compra de contado y obtener descuentos que incrementarían sus utilidades, esta es la razón por la cual recurren a un financiamiento para comprar productos como granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, galletas, jugos y otros productos.
texts.en: 39 year old Adelayda lives in the town of Somotillo. She has a general store there. Her entrepreneurial idea arose when she decided to invest some savings that she had into this business. Her business has gradually grown until it has become the income source that her family uses to cover their daily expenses. Her greatest challenge is having insufficient working capital to buy supplies in cash and obtain the discounts that would increase her profits. This is the reason she has turned to a loan to buy products such as staple grains, candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, juices, and other products.

loans.use: buy dry goods, candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, juices, and other goods.

loans.name: Lucrecia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lucrecia de 47 años de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos:  los 2 mayores trabajan y la apoyan con los gastos y el menor cursa la secundaria, ademas cuenta con el apoyo de su compañero de vida quien asume los gastos del hogar. Lucrecia es maestra de educacion primaria desde hace 22 años. 

Esta solicitando su 4to credito para comprar materiales de construccion para iniciar la edificacion de su casa en un solarcito que su papá le acaba de dar, ya que con los credito anteriores remodelo una casa que tiene fuera de la ciudad para su hijo mayor que habita en ella junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Lucrecia is 47 years old and single.  She has three children: the two eldest work and support her with expenses and the youngest is in high school.  She also has the support of her life partner who covers the household expenses.  Lucrecia has been an elementary school teacher for 22 years.

Lucrecia is requesting her fourth loan to buy building supplies so that she can start building her house on a plot of land that her father has just given her.  She used her previous loans to remodel a house that she has outside of the city for her eldest son who lives there with his family.

loans.use: to build a house

loans.name: Norwin Antonio

texts.es:
Norwin de 36 años de edad es soltero, tiene un niño de 5 años de edad, labora como fontanero en ENACAL desde hace 2 años, ademas hace trabajos extras de fontaneria a personas que le buscan despues de su jornada laboral.

Esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de mejorar su casa,  embaldosando su cuarto, ya que con el invierno las lluvias se humedece el cuarto y no quiere que su pequeño hijo se enferme. 

Su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su familia las condiciones basicas del hogar y que su hijo crezca y sea una persona de bien.
texts.en:
Norwin is 36 years old, single and has a 5 year-old son.  He has been working as a plumber for ENACAL for two years.  He also does extra, private plumbing work for people who request it after he finishes his workday.

Norwin is requesting his second loan to improve his house by tiling a room since, in the winter, the rain makes the room damp and he doesn't want his young son to become sick.

Norwin's biggest dreams are to be able to provide his family with the basic conditions they need in their home and for his son to grow up and become an honest and upstanding citizen.

loans.use: to tile a room

loans.name: Dilma Maria

texts.es:
Dilma trabaja para desde hace 11 años como  medico general. Esta solicitando  su 6to credito con el objetivo de mejorar las paredes de su vivienda que estan en mal estado y brindarle a su familia mayor seguridad. Cabe mencionar que con los creditos anteriores ha realizado mejoras en su casa, sin embargo hasta ahora espera hacerlo con el apoyo de kiva. 

Sueña con poder seguir mejorado su casa y  las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Dilma has been working as a doctor (GP) for 11 years.  She is requesting her sixth loan with the aim of improving the walls in her home, which are in a bad state of repair, and providing her family with better safety.  She used her previous loans to make improvements to her home.  However, from now on, she hopes to do it with Kiva's support.  

Dilma dreams of being able to continue improving her home and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to repair her walls

loans.name: Geoconda Marbelly

texts.es: Geoconda es casada, tiene 2 hijos, gracias a este proyecto habitacional obtuvo su vivienda para irla pagando poco a poco; obtiene sus ingresos por venta de leche, queso, cuajada y venta de joyas de plata. Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa, esta vez para poner el piso del porche y terminarlo, ya que con el credito anterior solo pudo hacer su cocina, y ahora espera poder terminar el porche para brindarle a sus hijos mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Geoconda is married and has two children.  Thanks to a housing project, she obtained a home which she is able to pay for bit by bit.  She makes income through selling milk, cheese, 'cuajada' (milk curd) and silvery jewelry.  

Geoconda is requesting her second loan so that she can continue improving her home.  This time she will lay flooring on her porch and finish it off since, with her previous loan, she was only able to do her kitchen and she hopes to be able to finish off the porch so that she can provide her children with better living conditions.

loans.use: to lay flooring on her porch

loans.name: William

texts.es: William, un joven padre de familia de 29 años, es natural de Chupaca, vive con su esposa y su hijo en casa de su madre. Tiene experiencia como músico desde hace 5 años, toca el bajo y es guitarrista, conforma parte de una banda musical donde tocan varios géneros musicales desde lo típico vernacular hasta lo mas moderno en rock y cumbia. Los contratos que recibe  dentro de su grupo son semanales por lo que siempre tiene trabajo como músico que cobran por hora. Pero el gran sueño de William es tener su propio grupo musical y prepararse en música, lo que sabe de música lo aprendió  por unas amistades que le enseñaron a tocar, sin embargo desea tener conocimientos mas profundos de música. De manera paralela vende animales en la feria ganadera de su zona, aprovechando los conocimientos que sus padres le enseñaron este oficio, por tanto tiene proyectos de incrementar su capital de trabajo. Fue invitado a formar parte del grupo solidario que integra por medio de un familiar y se compromete a responder puntualmente a los pagos mensuales que se le asigne porque tiene en claro su inversión futura. Destinará el dinero en la compra de ovejas para vender y una parte en el mantenimiento de su instrumento musical.
texts.en: William, a young father of 29 years of age, is from Chupaca. He lives with his wife and his son in his mother's house. He has been a musician since he was 5 years old - he plays the bass and is a guitarist - and he is a member of a band that plays various styles of music from the local vernacular to more modern rock and cumbia. The contracts that he gets with the group are weekly and he can always get work as a musician paid by the hour. But William's greatest dream is to have his own musical group and to learn more. What he knows about music he learnt from some friends who taught him to play, but he wants to have a deeper understanding of music. At the same time, he sells animals in the livestock market in his area, drawing on everything that his parents taught him about this work, and he has projects to increase his working capital. He was invited to be part of the community bank by a relative and he promises to make his monthly repayments punctually because he has future investments clearly in mind. He will use the loan to buy sheep to sell and also part of it for maintaining his musical instrument.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: G.s. Zuniga Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario está conformado por Rosa  y Maria Estela. Rosa tiene su negocio que es una pulpería ella tiene 39 años, su espíritu emprendedor y sus ganas de salir adelante han contribuido a que ingresos mejoren con su familia. Inicio esta actividad hace 6 años, al no tener mucho capital empezó con pocos productos. Este financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, enlatados, fósforos, sal y productos del hogar.
texts.en: This loan group is comprised of Rosa and Maria Estela. Rosa has a grocery store and she is 39 years old. Her entrepreneurial spirt and her desire to succeed have helped to improve her family income. She began this business 6 years ago, and she began with only a few products because she didn't have much capital. This loan will be used to buy staple grains, candy, canned goods, matches, salt, and home products.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, candy, canned goods, matches, salt, and home products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Yina Aracelly

texts.es: Yïna de 32 años de edad es enfermera de profesion desde hace 14 años. Esta solicitando  su 7mo credito con el objetivo de comprar zinc y perlines para ponerle a su casa, ya que el que tiene se encuentra en mal estado y como se acerca el invierno y no quiere que sus hijos se enfermen por la humedad.  Sueña con ver su casa bien acondicionada, pues es el patrimonio que sus padres le dejaron y el que le quiere heredar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Yïna is 32 years old.  She is a nurse by profession and has been in this job for 14 years.  She is requesting her seventh loan to buy corrugated metal sheets and beams for her home as her current roof is in a bad state of repair.  Winter is approaching and she does not want her children to become sick because of the damp.

Yïna dreams of seeing her home nicely finished as it is the inheritance that her parents left her and she would like to pass it on to her children.

loans.use: to replace her roof

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.en: Oswaldo is 21 years old and lives in Machachi, Ecuador. He is single and lives with his mother. Oswaldo is an enterprising person who confronts problems calmly so that they can be resolved. He is engaged in the sale of oil and other industrial lubricants. He is seeking this loan to acquire more products to sell and expand his business. Oswaldo began his business two years ago. At the beginning, he did not have much success and almost “threw in the towel” until his mother’s encouragement helped him move forward. With his income, he helps his mother support his younger siblings. This is his second loan from FODEMI. Oswaldo reports that his first loan helped him expand his merchandise. He hopes this loan will help him give more support to his family. His dream is to continue growing his business and supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy more oil and industrial lubricants to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lucrecia Isolda

texts.es: Lucrecia de 50 años de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos mayores, trabaja como tecnica de planta desde hace 24 años. Esta solicitando  su 8vo credito con el objetivo de cambiar el techo de su casa que se encuentra en mal estado y no quiere que su familia se enferme por la humedad. Su mayor sueño es poder mejorar poco a poco su vivienda para brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia que es su razon de ser.
texts.en: Lucrecia is 50 years old, single, and has three grown-up children.  She has been working as a plant technician for 24 years.  She is requesting her eighth loan to replace the roof of her house as it is in a bad state of repair and she doesn't want her family to become sick as a result of the damp.  Her biggest dream is to be able to gradually improve her home so that she can provide her family with more comfort as they mean everything to her.

loans.use: to replace her roof

loans.name: Elizabeth Milagros

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth, es madre soltera tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad,vive en casa de sus padres, al salir a trabajar deja a su hijo al cuidado de su madre,elizabeth se dedica a vender ropa en el mercado, ella tiene un pequeño local el cual adquirio con mucho esfuerzo, ya viene laborando en esta actividad mas de 2 años el desafíos que enfrenta la señora elizabeth es tener que dejar a su hijo con su mama y no dedicarle el tiempo que requiere para su cuidado, el dinero del préstamo sera invertido en comprar mercadería,para el negocio como pantalones ,chompas ,casacas ,medias, busos polares ,entre otros, el sueño que tiene elizabeth es hacer crecer mas su negocio, para el bienestar para su familia, elizabeth esta muy agradecida con la confianza que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a single mother who has a 2 year-old son.  She lives in her parents' home.  When she goes out to work, she leaves her son in her mother's care.

Elizabeth sells clothes in the market.  She has a small sales location which she acquired with a lot of effort.  She has been working in this business for more than two years.  The challenge that she faces is having to leave her son with her mom and not being able to spend enough time looking after him herself.  

Elizabeth will invest her loan money in buying merchandise for her business such as pants, sweaters, jackets, tights, fleece tops, etc.  Her dream is to further grow her business for the well-being of her family.  Elizabeth is very grateful for the trust that is being placed in her.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, jackets, fleece tops, tights, sweaters, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a sewer drain

loans.name: Oscar Darío

texts.es:
Desde sus 16 años Oscar Darío aprendió a pintar y  realizar acabados en obras de construcción labor que desde entonces desempeña con esmero y dedicación de lunes a sábado de 8:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. o según el horario que sus clientes requieran, ya que como dice él mismo, el servicio es lo mas importante para que su negocio prospere ya que así serán mas clientes quienes prefieran sus servicios y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida mejorará.

Actualmente Oscar quiere mejorar su microempresa y para ello necesita un préstamo que le permita hacer adecuaciones locativas y reforzar el inventario de insumos necesarios para su trabajo. Oscar sueña con incrementar día a día sus ventas y que su negocio finalmente sea un legado para sus hijos con el cual les podrá ofrecer un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Oscar Darío learned to paint and decorate on building sites when he was 16 years old.  Since then he has carried out his work with care and commitment.  He works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.00am to 6.00pm, or whenever his customers want him to do the work because, as he himself says, the service he provides is very important if he wants his business to prosper as good service will provide him with more loyal customers and this, in turn, will lead to an improvement in his quality of life.

Oscar would currently like to improve his small business and needs a loan which will allow him to do some structural work and strengthen the stock of supplies that he needs to carry out his work.  Oscar dreams of increasing his sales day by day and for his business to finally become an inheritance that he can pass down to his children and which will enable him to offer them a better future.

loans.use: to do some structural work and strengthen his stock

loans.name: Erick Josue

texts.es: Erick de 34 años de edad trabaja  como tecnico catastra para la Alcaldia desde hace 6 años. Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de comprar zinc para cambiar el techo de su cuarto que se encuentra en mal estado, y asi brindarle a su esposa e hijo mayor seguridad y evitar cualquier enfermedad. Sueña con poder darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Erick is 34 years old and has been working as a land surveyor for the council for 6 years.  He is requesting his second loan to buy corrugated metal sheets so that he can replace his bedroom roof as it is in a bad state of repair.  This will enable him to provide his wife and child with better safety and avoid illness.  He dreams of being able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to fix his roof

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité  “Nueva Esperanza se conformo con la iniciativa D. la señora Isabel que se mostro muy interesada por el programa. Se informó y luego D. esto motivo a sus amigas y parientes y formaron el grupo. Este comité se encuentra en el segundo ciclo, Actualmente cuentan con 12 integrantes,culminaron el primer ciclo sin inconvenientes,han demostrado union y solidaridad entre las compañeras.
Ellas están muy contentas D. trabajar juntas, ya que saben que la unión hace la fuerza, y que por medio D. esa fuerza podrán llevar un poco mas D. ingresos a sus casas, con lo cual podrán vivir decorosamente.
La Sra Isabel se dedica a la cría y venta D. animales, desD. hace ya unos cuantos años. Comenta que esto le ha servido para poder paliar los gastos D. la casa.Sabe que todo su sacrificio algún día dará sus frutos.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra D. mas animales, y ademas D. eso para la compra D. alimentos para los animales que cría y venD.. DesD. ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
The  “Nueva Esperanza" [New Hope] committee was formed on the initiative of Isabel, who was very interested in the program. She became informed and then motivated her friends and relatives and they formed the group. This committee is in its second cycle. At present, they have 12 members. They finished their first cycle with no problems and have shown themselves to be united and supportive as members. 

They are very happy to work together, since they know that united they are strong. With their strength, they will be able to bring a little more income home, and live decent lives. Isabel has raised and sold animals for several years. She remarks that this has maD. her able to help pay expenses in her home. She knows that her sacrifice will one day have results.
 
She is asking for the loan to buy more animals as well as to buy feed for the animals she raises and sells. She is grateful to the Fundación for the opportunities it gives.

loans.use: to buy animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Luis Bayardo

texts.es: Luis Bayardo de 29 años es un joven que decidió generar ingresos para mantener a su familia. El vende productos en general como cosméticos lociones, ropa femenina y accesorios, que distribuye entre sus clientes a través de créditos. Entre sus vecinos, amigos, familiares y referidos ha logrado un grupo de clientes fijos, que hoy forman parte de su registro de compradores permanentes. Su sueño más adelante es tener un local donde pueda tener más comodidad para ofrecer sus productos. El motivo por el cual solicita su financiación es para la compra de perfumes, toallas, sabanas, ropa en general y ropa interior.
texts.en: Luis Bayardo is 29 years old.  He is a young man who decided to make income in order to support his family.  He sells general merchandise such as cosmetics, lotions, women's clothes and accessories which he distributes to his customers through loans.  Through his neighbors, friends, family members and people who he has been recommended to, he has managed to establish a group of regular customers who currently make up his list of permanent buyers.  His dream for the future is to buy premises where he can sell his products more comfortably.  He is requesting this loan to buy perfume, towels, sheets, clothes and underwear.

loans.use: to buy perfume, towels, sheets, clothes and underwear

loans.name: Ivan Antonio

texts.es: Ivan de 37 años de edad es  casadp, trabaja para la Alcaldia  desde hace 16 años,  como  policia municipal. Esta solicitando  su 1er credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo que esta en mal estado y construyendo la letrina. y evitar cualquier enfermedad. Sueña con poder darle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ivan is 37 years old and married.  He has worked as a city police officer for 16 years.  He is requesting his first loan to improve his home.  He would like to replace his roof, which is in a bad state of repair, and build a toilet so that he can avoid becoming ill.  He dreams of being able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to build a bathroom

loans.name: Cristhian Guadalupe

texts.es: Cristhiam de 39 años de edad es madre soltera de una niña de 6 añitos, trabaja como maestra de primaria desde hace 22 años. Esta solicitando su 9no credito para continuar mejorando su casa, pues KIVA ya le ha dado su apoyo con los 3 ultimos creditos que solicito para construir su casa la cual esta haciendo de 2 pisos; ya hizo los cuartos y ahora quiere construir la parte de enfrente de la segunda planta por lo que solicita se le financie el credito y asi terminar la obra que con mucho esfuerzo ha hecho durante estos ultimos 4 años, ya que la mejora la ha hecho en varias etapas, porque no cuenta con el suficiente ingreso economico para hacerlo todo.  El mayor sueño que tiene es poder darle las mejores condiciones de vida a su bebita que es la razon de su vida y a quien desea darle las mejores condiciones para que crezca en un ambiente comodo y agradable.
texts.en:
Cristhian is 39 years old.  She is a single mother and has a 6 year-old daughter.  She has worked as an elementary school teacher for 22 years old.

Cristhian is requesting her ninth loan so that she can continue improving her home.  Kiva have already supported her with her three most recent loans which allowed her to build her home.  She is building a two-storey home and has already finished the rooms.  She would now like to build the front part of the second floor.  This is why she is requesting this loan.  She will thereby be able to finish the work that she has carried out with a lot of effort over the past four years.  She has done the work in several stages as she doesn't have enough income to do it all at once.

Cristhian's biggest dream is to be able to provide her little girl with better living conditions as she means the world to her.  She would like to provide her with better living conditions so that she can grow up in a comfortable and pleasant environment.

loans.use: to build the front part of the second floor of her home

loans.name: Sisinia

texts.es:
La señora Sisinia tiene 53 años D. edad, ella está casada con  el señor Anastacio quien tiene 53 años D. edad, ambos D. la ciudad D. Caacupe. Tienen hijos ya mayores D. edad.
La Sra Sisinia tiene una pequeña despensa donD. tiene todo tipo D. productos para ofrecer a sus clientes. Ella hace ya unos años que se dedica a esto, por lo que ya es muy conocida en el barrio y ya una buena clientela gracias a eso,pero le gustaría algún día tener una despensa mucho mas amplia.
Por más que la señora Sisinia y su esposo trabajen mucho tienen algunas necesidades que mejorar, pero D. ninguna forma ella se cansa D. luchar día a día por tener una mejor vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D.  azúcar, arroz, aceite, carnes, bebidas y así poder aumentar sus mercaderías para ofrecer un mejor servicio a la comunidad.
texts.en:
Sisinia is 53 years old. She is married to Anastacio, who is 53. They are both from the city of Caacupe and have grown children.  

Sisinia has a small store where she has all types of products to offer her customers. She has been doing this for a few years and is very well known in the neighborhood and has good clientele because of it. One day, she would like to have a bigger store.  

As much as Sisinia and her husband work they also need to improve. However, she never tires of struggling every day for a better life. 

She is asking for the loan to buy sugar, rice, oil, meats and beverages in order to increase her merchandise to offer a better service to the community.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, oil, meat, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Triunfadores Group

texts.en: Nelby's business is raising chickens. She is 19 years old and married. She lives with her parents and her two children who are 3 years old and 1 year old. Nelby is of strong character, works hard and is friendly. Nelby’s mother taught her everything she knows about raising chickens and Nelby also dedicates her time to the same work. Nelby works alone and reports that her business is going well except for the recent rains that killed some of her chickens. Because of this loss, she is seeking this loan to obtain and care for more chickens. This is her first loan and she hopes that it will help her succeed and support her children, as her children’s father does not support them. Nelby’s dream is to build her own house, move forward with her children, and return to school to work on having a bigger and better business. The Triunfadores Group is composed of four people who live near the city of Ibarra, Ecuador. Their group name means “Triumphant Ones.” There are three men in the group and one woman. The president of the group is Nelby.

loans.use: to purchase and care for chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cabinet to display her products.  She will also use part of her money to pay to complete the necessary paperwork to receive her degree

loans.name: Nancy Lorena

texts.es:
Nancy   tiene un negocio de venta de mercancías en el barrio Almirante Colón de la ciudad de Cartagena; allí comercializa con productos para el hogar y también ropa y cosméticos.  Sus activos corrientes están representados en su inventario, el que rota cada 11 días  y en sus cuentas por cobrar que al recuperarlas lentamente no alcanzan a responder a sus pedido; por eso aunque maneja una  buena rentabilidad, su capital de trabajo no es suficiente para solucionar las necesidades e intereses de su creciente clientela;  esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, que es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará ropa y artículos para el hogar en mayor volumen, para lograr no solo responder a pedidos de sus posibles compradores, sino también para obtener buenos descuentos e impactarlos con precios competitivos. 
Nancy vive con su familia conformada por su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos en las edades de 10 a 18 años, que estudian  y con los que tiene muchas metas, como las de lograr que lleguen a ser profesionales, pero principalmente que sean ciudadanos de bien. Por eso cuando hace 5 años inició su negocio, lo hizo con el propósito de apoyar el crecimiento y desarrollo de su familia, en un principio vendía mercancía puerta a puerta especialmente cosméticos y artículos de bisutería y gradualmente ha ido agregando otros artículos, basados en solicitudes que hacen sus clientes.   Con su negocio ha logrado ser independiente y manejar sus propios ingresos, por eso su sueño es continuar creciendo día a día como empresaria y como persona hasta lograr tener ingresos estables y un almacén bien posicionado,
texts.en:
Nancy has a business selling merchandise in Almirante Colón neighborhood, in the city of Cartagena.  There she sells household products and also clothes and cosmetics.  Her current assets are represented in her stock which has a turnover period of 11 days.  As she recovers her accounts receivable slowly, she is not able to meet her orders.  This means that, although she maintains a good profitability, she does not have enough working capital to meet the needs and interests of her growing customer base.  For this reason, she is requesting a Kiva loan which will be her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use it to buy clothes and household products in larger quantities so that she can not only respond to orders from her potential buyers but also obtain good discounts which will allow her to sell at competitive prices.

Nancy lives with her family: her husband and her two children, aged 10 and 18, who are studying and for whom she has many goals.  She would like them to become professionals but mainly she would like them to become honest and upstanding citizens.  For this reason, when she started her business five years ago, she did it with the goal of supporting her family's growth and development.  At first she sold merchandise door to door, especially cosmetics and costume jewelry.  She gradually added other items based on what her customers requested.

Through her business, Nancy has managed to be independent and manage her own income.  For this reason, her dream is to continue growing as a businesswoman and as a person until she manages to make stable income and own a store which is well positioned.

loans.use: to buy clothes and household products in larger quantities

loans.name: Elba Yadira

texts.es: Elba Yadira de 49 años,  ella tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 8 años, pues además es maestra de primaria, pero como su  salario no puede mantener a su familia, decide empezar con esta actividad. Elba solicita este crédito para la compra de sabanas, cremas, ropa en general, calzado, ropa interior y otros productos. Esto le permitirá seguir brindando un buen servicio a su clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Elba Yadira is 49 years old and has a business selling general merchandise.  She has been in this business for eight years.  She also works as an elementary school teacher but her salary from that job is not enough to support her family with.  For this reason, she decided to start working in this business.

Elba is requesting this loan to buy sheets, creams, clothes, footwear, underwear and other products.  This will allow her to continue providing a good service to her customers.  She will use the income that she makes to repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheets, creams, clothes, footwear, underwear and other products

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es:
El Sr. Teodoro tiene 53 años y esta casado con la señora Nilda de 50 años, tienen cuatro hijos una mujer y tres varones, estudiando y trabajando actualmente.
Empezo como aprendiz cuando tenia 13 años desde entonces se dedica a la chaperia,  pintura y reparación de automóviles, actualmente cuenta con su propio taller donde repara todo tipo de automóviles. Comenta que ya que desde pequeño ha trabajado no teme a ningún reto. El se define como un hombre luchador, trabajador y muy responsable por sobre todo. Dice que le gustaria que sus hijos estudien y que terminen alguna carrera  en la Universidad ya que el no tuvo la misma suerte.
El solicita el credito para la compra de mas repuestos para los vehículos que repara, de esa forma no tiene que recurrir a proveedores muy caros.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 53 years old and married to 50 year-old Nilda.  They have four children: one daughter and three sons, who are currently in school.

Teodoro started working as an apprentice when he was 13 years old.  Since then he has been panel beating, painting and repairing cars.  He says that as he has been working since he was a boy, he doesn't fear any challenge.  He describes himself as a tenacious, hard-working and very responsible man.  He says that he would like his children to study and finish a university degree as he did not have that same opportunity.

Teodoro is requesting a loan to buy more spare parts for the vehicles that he repairs.  In this way, he will not have to buy from very expensive suppliers.

loans.use: to buy car parts

loans.name: Sonia Patricia

texts.es:
Sonia es una mujer de gran empuje, pues maneja su tiempo, está pendiente del hogar y desde allí realiza ventas por catalogo a vecinos, familiares y amigos, quienes se han convertido en sus clientes. Esta emprendedora inició con su negocio motivada por la ilusión de mejorar sus ingresos y lograr tener una mejor calidad de vida ya que a raíz de la separación con su esposo la familia quedó en una situación económica muy difícil por lo que ella decidió emprender un nuevo negocio y trabajar duro para sacarlo adelante.
 
Actualmente, Sonia es vendedora de productos de revistas y accesorios, y es conciente que para generar mejores utilidades debe invertir capital de trabajo lo que le ayuda progresar y sacar adelante las ventas, sin embargo Sonia actualmente no cuenta con ese capital por lo que solicita un préstamo, oportunidad que hará de su microempresa un negocio prospero y una esperanza para el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sonia is a woman with a lot of drive.  She manages her time, looks after her household and makes catalog sales to her neighbors, family members and friends who have become her customers.  This entrepreneur started her business motivated by the hope of improving her income and achieving a better quality of life as, owing to her separation from her husband, her family was left in a very difficult financial situation.  She decided to set up a new business and work hard to get ahead in life.  

Sonia currently sells catalog products, and accessories.  She is aware that, in order to make more income, she must invest working capital to make progress and get ahead in her sales.  However, Sonia currently doesn't have this capital and so she is requesting a loan.  This opportunity will make her small business prosperous and a beacon of hope for her children's future.

loans.use: to buy stock for her business

loans.name: Juana Rosa

texts.es: Juana Rosa de 34 años, vive con su esposo y 3 hijos. Desde hace 3 años Juana se dedica una pulpería. Ella ofrece productos que se utilizan diariamente como leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos y  bebidas. Su negocio lo ha colocado en su casa para mayor comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos trata de cubrir todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia el crédito es para la compra de estos productos necesarios para atraer a sus clientes. Juana es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por darles mayores comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en: Juana Rosa is 34 years old.  She lives with her husband and three children.  Juana has run a grocery store for three years.  She sells essential household products such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs and drinks.  Her business is located in her home which provides her with more comfort and security.  She uses the profits she makes from selling her products to try and cover all her expenses and improve her family's standard of living.  This loan will be used to buy the products she needs to attract her customers.  Juana is a responsible, committed and hard-working person who would like to provide her children with more comfort in life.

loans.use: to buy milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs and drinks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: July

texts.es: July es una mujer trabajadora, tiene 26 años. Junto a su esposo Eloy y sus 2 hijos, viven en una casa alquilada, ubicada en el caserío de San Juan la libertad. El trabajo al que se dedica está laboriosa mujer, es la “agricultura”, hace 5 años que comenzó alquilando un terreno agrícola de 2 hectáreas, pagando anualmente sus alquileres. Con la adquisición de este terreno, inició la siembra de papa y arveja, los que  cuida, fertiliza y cultiva en compañía de su esposo. Los dos venden sus cosechas en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad más cercana a  “Tarma”; pero las semillas de papa los comercializan en el mismo caserío. Además comenta que hace poco incursionó en el negocio de compra y venta de papa al por mayor en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad, donde los días miércoles, viernes y domingo; hay mayor cantidad de personas que compran sus alimentos para la semana. Por lo que aprovecha la demanda generada para obtener un dinero extra. Ahora están trabajando arduamente para poder adquirir sus propios terrenos, y así minimizar costos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera”, y este es el décimo crédito que tiene con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus planes. Asimismo se compromete en pagar con puntualidad sus cuotas. July de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios kilos de papa de diferentes variedades, para implementar su negocio de compra y venta, y si el dinero le alcanza comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico para esparcirlo en sus cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
July is a hard-working, 26 year-old woman.  She lives together with her husband Eloy and her two children, in a rental house, in the small village of San Juan, La Libertad.

This hard-working woman works in 'agriculture'.  She started renting a 2-hectare plot of farmland five years ago, paying the rent yearly.  She started sowing potatoes and peas on the land and she cares for, fertilizes and grows these crops alongside her husband.  The couple sell their harvests in the wholesale market in the nearest town of Tarma.  However, she sells her potato seeds in her own village.  She tells us that a short time ago she also started buying and selling potatoes wholesale in the wholesale market in town.  Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays are the busiest days as people are buying their food for the week.  She takes advantage of the general demand to make some extra money.  Right now, the couple are working hard so that they can acquire their own farmland and thereby reduce their costs.

July is a member of the "Capital Semillera" community bank and this is her tenth loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you so that she can continue with her plans.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments punctually.  With your support, July will invest the money she has requested in buying several kilos of different varieties of potatoes to stock her sales business.  If the money stretches far enough, she will also buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to spread over her potato crops.

loans.use: to buy potatoes wholesale and to buy sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El Comité Mujeres Luchadoras de la ciudad de Villa Elisa cuenta con 19 integrantes, están en el noveno ciclo. Se reúnen en forma semanal, momento en el cual comparten ideas a realizar para las actividades así como también para resolver problemas en que se encuentran algunas señoras. Sin embargo con la ayuda de las demás integrantes siempre saben salir adelante, ya que lo que rige al grupo es la unión y ayuda mutua.
Todas las integrantes D. grupo se muestran solidarias y con ganas de salir adelante.
La Sra. Andresa de dedica a la venta de hortalizas. Ella todos los dias a muy tempranas horas de la mañana va en busca de los productos al mercado, para poder después salir a venderlos. Ella se siente muy orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que le parece un trabajo digno. Ella todo lo que hace es por el bien de su familia.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de mas verduras, como ser tomates, lechugas, repollos y demás, para poder venderlos después.
texts.en:
The group named "Mujeres Luchadoras" of the city of Villa Elisa is made up of 10 members. They are on their ninth loan cycle. They meet every week to share ideas on how to carry out their businesses and to solve problems that some of these women might be experiencing. With the help of the other members they always find a way to come out head. Unity and team work are principles that govern the group. 

All of the members of the group are team players who are eager to get ahead. 

Andresa sells produce. Every day, from the very early morning hours, she sets out to look for products in the market, to later go out to resell. She is very proud of what she does because she feels it is a dignified form of work. Everything that she does is for the good of the family.

She requests a loan to purchase more vegetables, such as: tomatoes, lettuce, cabbage, and others vegetables for later resale.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables and other produce for later resale.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es: Hugo tiene 28 años, es un hombre responsable y trabajador. En armonía familiar convive con Eraida y su hijo Johan, en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de San Juan de la libertad. A pesar de ser muy joven, tiene las ganas de triunfar y salir adelanta al igual que los integrantes de su asociación. El trabajo al que se dedica desde hace 6 años es la siembra de diferentes productos oriundos del lugar como: papa y arveja. Los que gracias al apoyo de su madre, quien le apoya en los cuidados que brinda, los puede comercializar en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es el tiempo que le dedica al cuidado de sus cultivos, ya que puede aprender mucho más de las técnicas para lograr una cosecha de calidad. Ahora él tiene sembrado papa, por ello su principal prioridad es fertilizarlos. Ahora requiere de capital para incursionar en la ganadería, y así obtener un dinero extra, ya que así le aconsejaron en su banco comunal. Él pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera logar sus objetivos con el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además se compromete en cumplir con todas sus cuotas. Hugo de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un “torete”, llamado así al Toro que tiene 12 meses de edad. Asimismo comprará sacos de abono orgánico para distribuirlos en sus cultivos de papa de la variedad “yungay” que cosechará dentro de unos meses.
texts.en:
Hugo, age 28, is a responsible and hard-working person.  He lives in familial harmony with his common-law wife, Eraid, and their son, Johan.  They live in their own house in a rural community in San Juan de la Libertad.

In spite of being very young, he has the desire to triumph and get ahead like the other members of his association.  For six years he has been growing different native products like potatoes and peas.  Thanks to his mother’s help in taking care of the plants, he is able to sell them at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma.  What he likes the most about his work is the time devoted to taking care of his crops.  By doing so he is able to learn a lot more about the techniques of achieving a quality harvest.  He has planted potatoes, and his first priority is to fertilize them.

He now needs a loan to enter the livestock business.  He will do this to get extra money.  This is what his communal bank advised him to do.  He belongs to the “Capital Semilla” (Seed Money) Communal Bank.  This is his second loan with MFP.  He hopes to achieve his objectives with help from all of you.  He pledges to make his payments on time.

Hugo will use the requested loan to buy a “torete”.  This is the name for a bull that is 12 months old.  He will also buy sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on his crops of “Yungay” (round white potato good for boiling) potatoes, which he will harvest within a few months.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer and a bull.

loans.name: Fortunato

texts.es: Fortunato tiene  65 años, es un hombre humilde. Hace 33 años unió su vida a Agustina, su esposa desde hace 8 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, todos ellos mayores de edad. Ahora viven solos en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de San Juan de la Libertad. La zona de San Juan, es conocida por sus buenas tierras de cultivo que en su mayoría son de papa. Por ese motivo el nombre de la asociación es “Capital semillera”. Desde muy joven comenzó con su oficio de agricultor, desde entonces sembró toda variedad de papa como: “pericholi, canchan y yungay”, todo depende de la temporada de cosecha y la calidad de sembrío. Su trabajo esmerado y su dedicación hicieron que adquiera 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, donde pudo obtener buenas ganancias y apoyar a sus hijos. Los que ahora con orgullo comenta: “Todos viven en Estados Unidos”. Se siente orgulloso de lo que logró y quiere seguir hasta el fin de sus días; trabajando la tierra que lo vio nacer. En todo este tiempo logró obtener un camión con el que trasporta cargamento de frutas y verduras a todo el país, además de visitar cada 6 meses la costa del país, donde comercializa la semilla que cosecha. Por todo ello quiere continuar sembrando y mejorando la calidad de sus cultivos. Él pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para lograr sus objetivos. Además se compromete a cumplir con puntualidad sus cuotas. Fortunato de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico, para distribuirlos entres sus cultivos de papa de la variedad “yungay”, que tiene sembrado en una hectárea de terreno agrícola. Asimismo piensa utilizarlo en sus próxima cosecha de papa  de la variedad “única”
texts.en:
Fortunato, age 65, is a humble man.  Thirty-three years ago he joined his life with Agustina, who has been his wife for eight years.  They have four children, and all of them are adults.  Now they live alone in their own house in the rural community of San Juan de la Libertad.  The San Juan zone is known for its good farmland upon which potatoes are mostly grown.  That is why the name of the association is “Capital Semillera” (Seed Money).

He started his occupation as a farmer when he was very young.  From then on he has planted all types of potatoes like “pericholi” (a white potato that is sweet and full of water), “canchan” (has a pink, thin skin; the meat is of a pale whitish color), and "yungay" (round white potato good for boiling).  Everything depends upon the harvesting season and the quality of the plants.  Through his painstaking work and his dedication he acquired three hectares of farmland.  With the land he was able to get good income and support his children.  He now proudly comments, “All of them live in the United States.”

He is proud of what he has achieved.  He wants to continue working the land where he was born until the end of his days.  In all of this time he managed to get a truck, which he uses to transport his fruit and vegetable cargo throughout the country.  In addition, he visits the coast of the country every six months to sell the seeds that he harvests.  He therefore wants to continue planting and improving the quality of his crops.

He belongs to the “Capital Semillera” (Seed Money) Commual Bank.  This is his seventh loan with MFP.  He hopes for your collaboration in order to achieve his objectives.  He pledges to make his payments on time.  Fortunato will use the requested loan to buy various sacks of organic fertilizers to apply to his yungay potato crops, which he has planted on a hectare of farmland.  He is thinking of using that land for the “única” variety of potato for the next harvest.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Neris

texts.es: Nery  trabaja con su madre y su hermana, (en la fotografía) en un negocio de su propiedad llamado  “Restaurante Mary”; ella vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Cartagena e inició en este negocio, cuando su madre se enfermó y debió asumir su liderazgo,  para continuar sosteniéndolo.  Como Nery y su familia trabajan diariamente por lograr el crecimiento de su negocio, están solicitando un aplanamiento financiero que les permita comprar mesas plásticas, sillas y una estufa industrial, para lograr mayor confort para sus clientes y mejorar los tiempos de trabajo de ellas tres. Este es la razón por la cual acuden a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual planea hacer crecer su negocio.  Su sueño es tener un local bien ubicado, donde pueda organizar mejor su negocio y generar empleo para otros;  este es justamente su mayor desafío, pues cada día quiere tecnificarlo, con equipos y herramientas cada vez más modernas, con las cuales logre mayor eficiencia.  Mientras todo esto ocurre Neris trabaja con su familia, logrando una  rotación de  inventarios diaria, porque vende todo lo que cocinan; así mismo sus compras rotan con esta misma frecuencia y con ello incurre en gastos de transporte diarios,  que planea disminuir gradualmente, realizándolas en mayores volúmenes y espaciándolas cada vez más, para lograr ahorrar  un poco y aumentar sus utilidades.
texts.en:
Nery works with her mother and her sister (in the photograph) in her own business called “Restaurante Mary”.  She lives with her husband and their two children in the city of Cartagena.  She started in this business when her mother became ill and Nery had to assume the leadership in order to maintain the business.

As Nery and her family work every day to achieve the growth of her business, they are requesting financial assistance that will allow them to buy plastic tables, chairs, and an industrial stove.  They will do this in order to provide greater comfort for their customers and to improve the work shifts for the three of them.

That is the reason they request a Kiva loan.  It is their first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization with which they plan to make their business grow.

Her dream is to have a well located place where she is able to better organize her business and generate employment for others.  This is exactly her greatest challenge.  Every day she wants to use technology with equipment and tools that are more modern.  She could use those to achieve greater efficiency.  

While all of this is happening Neris works with her family, achieving a daily turnover of inventory because she sells everything they cook.  Her purchases turnover with the same frequency.  Therefore she incurs daily transportation expenses.  She plans to gradually decrease these expenses by purchasing in greater volume and buying less frequently.  She will do this in order to save a little and to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy plastic tables, chairs, and an industrial stove.

loans.name: Ruben De Los Angeles

texts.es: El señor empezó trabajando en la compañía licorera del ingenio san Antonio, en sus tiempos libre hablaba con los especialista para que le enseñaran y fue de esa manera que aprendió a soldar, luego trabajo como ayudante de albañilería, donde aprendió el oficio y también aprendió fontanería, otro oficio que aprendió fue el de electricista. Luego se compro sus propias herramientas y empezó a desempañarse por sus propia cuenta en todos los oficios, y cuando se fue dando a reconocer ya lo buscaban para realizar trabajos grandes y fue de esa manera que ahora es contratista de albañilería y soldadura, donde también realiza trabajos de fontanería y electricidad residencial. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de cemento, hierro, escuadra, espátula y liquido para soldar.
texts.en: This gentleman started working for the distillery company Ingenio San Antonio.  In his spare time, he talked to the specialists and asked them to teach him.  This is how he learned to weld.  He then worked as a building assistant and learned that trade.  He also learned how to work as a plumber and an electrician.  He then bought his own tools and started working for himself in all these trades.  As he became well known, people would seek him out to do large jobs and this is how he now works as a building and welding contractor.  He also does plumbing jobs and domestic electrical work.  He is requesting a loan to buy cement, iron, set square, trowel and welding liquid.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, set square, trowel and welding liquid

loans.name: Balbino

texts.es: Balbino tiene  56 años, es un hombre responsable. Junto a su esposa Adela y sus 2 hijos, vive en armonía familiar en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de San Juan de la libertad. El trabajo al que se dedica esté laborioso hombre, es la agricultura. Ya tiene 40 años de experiencia en la siembra de papa en todas sus variedades, los que después de fertilizarlos y cosecharlos los comercializa en la costa del país, viajando constantemente en temporadas de cosecha, asimismo trabaja con el camión que posee, en el traslado de papa al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, así como también en el servicio de trasporte de cargamento de diferentes variedades ya sea  verduras, frutas y demás productos alimenticios a diferentes lugares del país, obteniendo mejores ganancias. Ahora tiene sembrado papa, en las variedades de yungay y andina, sobre sus 7 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas, donde tiene pensado ampliar para poder sembrar en mayores cantidades y trasportarlos a diferente puntos del país. Él pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera”, y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde agradece al poyo que recibido durante todo este tiempo. Asimismo pide que lo apoyen  nuevamente para continuar con sus objetivos, comprometiéndose a cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente. Balbino de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de papa de las variedades denominadas “canchan, única y pricholi”, asimismo varios sacos de abono orgánico para continuar con éxito sus próxima cosecha.
texts.en:
Balbino is 56 years old.  He is a responsible man who lives in family harmony together with his wife Adela and their two children.  They live in their own home which is located in the small village of San Juan, La Libertad.

This hard-working man is a farmer.  He has 40 years experience growing all varieties of potatoes.  After fertilizing and harvesting his potatoes, he sells them on the coast, travelling there constantly during harvest seasons.  He also works with a truck that he owns, transporting potatoes to the wholesale market in the town of Tarma.  He also transports cargo of different types such as vegetables, fruit and other food product, to other parts of the country.  This makes him better profits.

Balbino is currently growing yungay and andina varieties of potato on his 7 hectares of farmland.  He is thinking of expanding his land so that he can grow in larger quantities and transport his crops to different parts of the country.

Balbino is a member of the "Capital Semillera" community bank and this is his eighth loan from MFP.  He is grateful for the support that he has received up to now.  He asks you to support him once again so that he can continue achieving his goals.  For his part, he pledges to make his repayments punctually.  With your support, Balbino will invest the money he has requested in buying canchan, única and pricholi varieties of potato seed.  He will also buy several sacks of organic fertilizer so that he can continue working successfully with his upcoming harvests.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Willan Osvaldo

texts.en: Willan Osvaldo, who goes by his middle name, is 29 years old and lives near the city of Ibarra, Ecuador. He is unmarried and has two children aged four years, 5 months and one year, eight months, respectively. Osvaldo is the kind of man who gets along with everybody. Osvaldo and his brother make bricks. They complete the process from start to finish, forming the bricks and baking them in their large brick oven. Osvaldo began his business with a small amount of credit 10 years ago. Since then, he reports that he owes his business, his house, and his life, as he knows it to the opportunity afforded to him by his first loan. He did not have the capital to start the business. Osvaldo has many dreams for the future. He wants to continue making bricks. However, he sees expansion in his future. His goal is to buy land, build houses with his own bricks, and sell his houses.

loans.use: to buy brickmaking materials and firewood

loans.name: Susana Reyna

texts.es: La señora Susana es casada,tiene casa propia su esposo se dedica al lavado de oro,trabaja en la afueras de la cuidad, tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 8 años de edad solo uno de ellos esta en el colegio,susana se dedica a la venta de golosinas en un triciclo de forma ambulante viene realizando esta labor por mas de 3 años , el dinero que esta solicitando es para comprar mas mercadería como gaseosa, chocolates galletas entre otros susana tiene mucho sueños tiene muchos sueños uno de ellos es hacer crecer mas su negocio y en un futuro tener un local propio donde vender su mercadería y así dejaría de vender en la calle, susana esta muy agradecida con el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Susana is married and owns her own home.  Her husband works as a gold panner, on the outskirts of the city.  They have two children aged 3 and 8.  Only one of the children is currently in school.

Susana sells treats from a three-wheeled cart as an itinerant vendor.  She has been in this line of work for more than three years.  She is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise such as soda, chocolates, cookies, etc.  Susana has many dreams.  One of her dreams is to further grow her business.  In the future, she would like to own her own premises where she can sell her merchandise.  This would mean she could stop selling in the street.  Susana is very grateful for the support she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soda, chocolates, cookies, Chisitos (cheese puffs), etc.

loans.name: Aristides

texts.es:
Arístides es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Arístides nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco (Perú), él tiene 65 años de edad y está casado y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos. Actualmente, Arístides vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. 

Arístides es artesano de profesión y tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde elabora muñequería, bisutería y otras cosas más. Ya son 20 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad el socio requiere el préstamo para uso personal osea desea para comprar un terreno para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Aristides is a responsible and hard-working person who, because of these qualities, was invited by his companions to participate in the “Chaska” Communal Bank of the Arariwa Association.

Aristides tells us that he was born in the city of Cusco, province and department of Cusco (Peru). He is 65 years old, married, and he and his wife have 4 children.  At present, Aristides lives in the city where he was born and his economic activities take place.

Aristides is an artisan by profession and has a small shop in his domicile where he makes dolls' items, costume jewelry, and other things.  He has been doing this for 20 years and the business is doing very well, thanks to the effort he puts into it. 

On this occasion, Aristides needs a loan for personal use: he wants to buy a lot so he can build his house.

loans.use: to buy land for constructing his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pasto, ella vende pasto desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, ella vende en forma ambulatoria, ella quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de pasto y también quiere que sus hijos terminen de estudiar ya que uno de ellos estudia la carrera profesional de ingeniería civil. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de estudio de su hijo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) Communal Bank, located in Cusco district, province, and department.

She is 54 years old, married, and has 6 children. She sells animal feed every day from 8:00 am until 6:00 pm, in the streets.  She wants to expand her feed business and, also, she wants her children to complete their education. One of her children is already studying for the career of civil engineer.

She requests the loan to make monthly payments for her son's studies.

The member is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to make monthly payments for her child's education.

loans.name: Yessica

texts.en:
Yessica is 28 years old and married with one boy who is five years old. She is the owner of a little store that sells a bit of everything. She also sells chicken that she has made along with soft drinks. 

Yessica is asking for a loan so that she may buy more necessities for her store. Specifically she plans on buying chickens, all types of soft drinks and other food to sell in her store. She is happy about the loan and is committed to making all her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chicken and soft drinks to sell in her store

loans.name: Sharon

texts.es:
Sharon es una persona amable, estudiosa y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Sharon nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco (Perú), ella tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera. Actualmente, Sharon vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades. 

Sharon está estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería de Sistemas en la Universidad Particular Andina del Cusco y está cursando el primer semestre. Ella en sus horas libres ayuda a su hermana en la tienda multiservicios. Ella requiere el préstamo para pagar sus matriculas de la Universidad y para ahorrar. El sueño de Sharon es trabajar en una empresa prestigiosa de desarrollo de software.
texts.en:
Sharon is a kind, studious and responsible person who, owing to these personal qualities, was invited by her friends to join Asociación Arariwa's 'Chaska' community bank.

Sharon tells us that she was born in the city of Cusco, in Cusco province and department, in Peru.  She is 19 years old and single.  Sharon currently lives in the city in which she was born and this is where she carries out her work.

Sharon is studying for a degree in Systems Engineering at the Universidad Particular Andina, in Cusco.  She is in her first semester.  In her free time, Sharon helps her sister in her general store.  She needs this loan to pay for her university registration fees and to save.  Sharon's dream is to work for a prestigious software development company.

loans.use: to pay for her university registration fees

loans.name: Susy

texts.es: Susy tiene 21 años; vive con su esposo Moisés y su hijo Jean Piere en casa de su madre, ubicada en el caserío de San Juan de la libertad. Como mujer de campo se dedica a la agricultura, su madre le enseñó todo lo necesario para poder emprender sus propios cultivos, pero necesitaba el apoyo financiero. Hace poco recibió una invitación para ser parte de un banco comunal, es por ello que comenzó a trabajar desde hace un año con MFP. A pesar de tener 3 años de experiencia en la siembra de papa de todas las variedades, le va muy bien en la comercialización, su principal ventaja. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder pasar la mayor parte de su tiempo con su familia; ya que recibe el consejo de su padre con quien siembra en sociedad. En esta campaña agrícola está segura que cosechará gran cantidad de papa. Y con la venta que negociará en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, está segura que podrá ahorrar un poco más para obtener su propio terreno agrícola y así mejorar los ingresos económicos de su casa, para poder ahorrar y en el futuro construir su propia casa. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “capital semillera”, y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera lograr sus objetivos con la ayuda de su banco comunal, además de comprometerse a cumplir puntualmente con sus cuotas. Susy de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico para distribuirlos en su próxima siembra de papa de la variedad “Yungay”.
texts.en:
21-year old Susy lives with her husband Moisés and their son Jean Piere in her mother’s house which is located in the village of San Juan de la Libertad. As a woman living in the country, she earns her living through farming. Her mother taught her all that was necessary to tend her own fields but she needed a loan.

A short while ago Susy received an invitation to be part of a community bank, and she began working with Kiva partner MFP a year ago. Her main advantage is three years’ experience growing all kinds of potatoes, so her business is going well. What she most enjoys about her work is the chance to spend a lot of her time with her family; she works alongside her father who gives her advice. 

She is sure that this season she will have a good potato harvest. In addition, because of the sales she has negotiated with the wholesale market in the town of Tarma, she is certain that she will be able to save a little more so that she can buy her own piece of land to farm. She would then earn more money and be able to save enough to build her own home.

Susy belongs to the Capital Semillera Community Bank, and this is her second loan with MFP. She expects to reach her goals with the help of her community bank, and as well she promises to make the repayments punctually. Once she has obtained the loan, she will use the money to buy several bags of organic fertilizer to spread on her next crop of Yungay potatoes.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende chompas, pantalones, polos, camisas y casacas, ella vende en forma independiente, por medio de este pequeño la socia  saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos, pantalones, chompas y camisas al por mayor.
                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This woman is a member of the Mujeres Emprendedoras Community Bank which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 54 years old, married, and has five children. As well as doing all her household tasks, she has a business selling clothing such as sweaters, pants, t-shirts, shirts, and jackets. She runs her business independently and through it she manages to help her children get ahead. She is seeking a loan to expand her clothing business and buy t-shirts, pants, sweaters, and shirts at wholesale prices.

She is happy to get a loan and promises to pay it back.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, pants, sweaters, and shirts at wholesale prices

loans.name: Francisco Washingthon

texts.es:
Francisco de 58 años,  es un hombre trabajador que es taxista. Trabaja desde muy temprano en la mañana en su taxi recorriendo las calles de Guayaquil.  Tiene muchos impedimentos para recorrer las calles de Guayaquil ya que en estos años que ha estado trabajando se ha incrementado la delincuencia.    

Trabaja todos los días en su taxi recorriendo las calles de Guayaquil. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su trabajo en el taxi. El quiere con el préstamo comprar llantas, repuestos, herramientas para su carro.
texts.en:
58-year old Francisco is a hardworking taxi driver. He starts work very early in the morning driving his taxi through the streets of Guayaquil. There are many obstacles to overcome in the streets, and in the years he’s been driving he’s seen an increase in crime. 

Francisco drives his taxi every day and has many hopes for the future. With the loan he plans to buy tyres, spare parts, and tools for his car.

loans.use: to buy tyres and spare parts

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 26 años, es una mujer soltera y trabajadora; que vive en compañía de su mamá y su papá, a los que quiere y cuida en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde que tenía 20 años de edad, se dedicó a la agricultura, siendo sus principales cultivos la papa y arveja; lo que más le gusta de su labor es poder cuidar de su becerra mientras limpia la maleza que crece entre sus sembríos, pero lo que no le gusta son las temporadas donde los agricultores cosechan gran cantidad de hortalizas, ya que saturan el mercado y no le permite tener buenas ganancias. Pero es en está temporada que ella deja secar la arveja, la cual se convierte en semilla, vendiendo el saco de semilla a un mayor precio en el mercado central de Tarma, permitiéndole estabilizar su economía. Además de dedicar su tiempo libre en la enseñanza a niños menores de 5 años de edad como profesora. Comenta que como mujer joven, el papel que cumple su banco comunal en su vida, es preponderante, ya que le ayuda a crecer y forjarse nuevas metas. Por todos lo aciertos está pensando abrir un restaurante en su zona, ya que no existe una. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera una vez más de su apoyo para lograr sus objetivos. Además se compromete en ser puntual en sus cuotas. Elizabeth de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja que sembrará dentro de poco, además de varios sacos de abono orgánico para comenzar con éxito está temporada agrícola.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 26 years old.  She is a single and hard-working woman who lives with her mom and dad who she loves and cares for in their own home which is located in the small village of Cumutay.

Elizabeth has been farming since she was 20 years old.  Her main crops are potatoes and peas.  What she most enjoys about her work is being able to care for her calf while she is getting rid of the weeds that grow amongst her crops.  What she doesn't enjoy are the seasons when farmers harvest a large quantity of vegetables as they flood the market and don't allow her to make good profits.  However, during such seasons she leaves her peas to dry and turns them into seeds.  She then sells the sacks of seeds for a better price in the central market in Tarma.  This allows her to stabilize her finances.  In addition, Elizabeth also spends her spare time teaching children under the age of 5.  She tells us that, as a young woman, her community bank plays a dominant role in her life since it helps her to grow and forge new goals.  Elizabeth is planning to open a restaurant in her area as there isn't one right now.

Elizabeth is a member of the 'Pioneros de Cumutay' (Cumutay Pioneers) community bank and this is her ninth loan from MFP.  She hopes, once more, to receive your support in helping her achieve her goals.  For her part, she pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  With your support, Elizabeth will invest the money she has requested in buying two bags of pea seeds which she will sow shortly.  She will also buy several sacks of organic fertilizer so that she can make a successful start to this season.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 49 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende ropa para niños, mujeres y varones, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos, pantalones y chompas  al por mayor.
                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the 'Mujeres Emprendedoras' (Entrepreneurial Women) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 49 years old, lives with her partner, and has five children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling clothes.  She sells children's, men's and women's clothes independently.  She works from 9.00am to 6.00pm and, through her business, she gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to expand her clothing business.  She is requesting this loan to buy tops, pants and sweaters wholesale.

The borrower is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy tops, pants and sweaters wholesale

loans.name: Celinda

texts.en:
Celinda is 23 years old and single with no children. She is the owner of a small pharmacy located in the small town of Ollantaytambo. 

Celinda has asked for a $200 loan in order to buy more medications to sell in her pharmacy. She also plans to buy perfume to sell. This loan will allow her to expand her business by purchasing more drugs and perfume to sell.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical drugs and perfume for her pharmacy

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 31 años, está casada con Héctor de 35 años de edad. Ambos tiene 3 hijos: Jessica, de 13, Piero, de 6 y Sandra, de 4 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. El trabajo al que se dedica está talentosa mujer es la agricultura, sus principales sembríos constan de papa, arveja y flor de gladiolo; según menciona su cosecha de gladiolo, le ofrece constantemente ingresos, ya que cosecha semanalmente. Ya tiene 13 años dedicándose a ello, y es conocida entre los vendedores del mercado mayorista de Tarma, los que aseguran que es una mujer trabajadora y honesta. Lo que le molesta de su trabajo, son las temporadas donde bajan los precios de sus cosechas, pero a pesar de las inconveniencias, está segura que podrá salir adelante. Ya que también se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una tienda que abrió en su casa, y le va muy bien en su negocio. Por ello está pensando en expandir su tienda de comestibles, pero en la ciudad de Tarma, donde hay mayor movimiento comercial. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con su negocio. Además se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, ya que obtendrá buenos resultados en sus proyectos con el apoyo de su banco comunal, que son personas responsables y trabajadoras. Nancy de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja para su próxima cosecha. Además de varios sacos de abono orgánico para distribuirlo entre sus cultivos de flor de gladiolo.
texts.en:
Nancy is 31 years old.  She is married to 35 year-old Héctor and the couple have three children: 13 year-old Jessica, 6 year-old Piero and 4 year-old Sandra.  They live together as a family in their own home which is located in the small village of Cumutay.

This talented woman is a farmer.  Her main crops are potatoes, peas and gladioli.  She tells us that her gladioli constantly make her income as she harvests them weekly.  She has been in this business for 13 years and is well known by the sellers in the wholesale market in Tarma.  They say that she is a hard-working and honest woman.  What Nancy doesn't enjoy about her work are the seasons when the prices for her harvests drop.  However, in spite of the difficulties, she is certain that she will be able to get ahead.

Nancy also sells basic household products in a store that she opened in her home and her business is doing very well.  For this reason, she is thinking of expanding her grocery store but in the town of Tarma where there is more sales activity.

Nancy belongs to the 'Pioneros de Cumutay' (Cumutay Pioneers) community bank and this is her ninth loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you so that she can continue in her business.  For her part, she pledges to make her loan repayments on time as she will obtain good results in her projects with the support of her community bank.  The members of her community bank are responsible and hard-working people.

With your support, Nancy will invest the money she has requested in buying a bag of pea seeds for her upcoming harvest.  In addition, she will buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to spread over her gladioli.

loans.use: to buy a bag of pea seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 48 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras como zanahorias, tomates, cebollas y pepinos, ella vende en el mercado desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras.
