La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zanahorias, pepinos, cebollas, tomates y papas.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the "Mujeres Emprendedoras" (Entrepreneurial Women) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

The borrower is 48 years old, married, and has five children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling vegetables such as carrots, tomatoes, onions and cucumbers.  She makes her sales in the market from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  Through this small business, she gets her children ahead in life.  The borrower would like to expand her vegetable business.  She is requesting a loan to buy carrots, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes and potatoes.  She is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as carrots, cucumbers, onions, tomatoes and potatoes

loans.name: Lucia Jeronima

texts.es: Lucia Jeronima tiene 30 años, ella es una microempresaria compra y vende ropa. Ella vende de manera ambulantes sus clientes principales son amigos, vecinos, oficinistas y familiares, otorga créditos en donde les brinda un plazo, para el recoger el dinero, tiene un hijo de 12 años, ella deposita las  esperanzas de lograr ayudar a su hija para que en un futuro sea exitosa. Su sueño es tener un punto de ventas para incrementar sus ingresos. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de sabanas, camisas, pantalones, trajes entre otros.  Trabaja para lograr sus sueños y los de su familia continua manteniendo su negocio para mejorar cada día.
texts.en:
Lucia Jeronima is 30 years old.  She is a small businesswoman who buys and sells clothes.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor.  Her main customers are friends, neighbors, office workers and family members.  She provides her goods on credit and gives her customers a set amount of time before she collects payment.  She has a 12 year-old daughter.  Lucia hopes that she will be able to help her daughter to enjoy a successful future.  Her dream is to own her own sales premises so that she can increase her income.

Lucia will use the loan that she has requested to buy sheets, shirts, pants, dresses, etc.  She works to achieve her own dreams and those of her family.  She keeps her business going so that she can improve every day.

loans.use: to buy sheets, shirts, pants, dresses, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 29 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en una discoteca de la ciudad de Cusco como mozo y también trabaja en una carpintería, el hace muebles, sillas y puertas, el socio por medio de este trabajo y negocio saca adelante a su hijo, el socio quiere mejorar en el trabajo y también quiere ampliar el negocio de carpintería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar un artefacto para su casa para comprar un televisor.
 

                                                
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Mujeres Emprendadoras" ("Enterprising Women") communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is 29 years old.  He lives with his partner and has one child.  His daily activities alternate between his work as a waiter in a nightclub in the city of Cusco and his work in a carpentry shop.  He makes furniture, chairs and doors.  Through this job and business, he is moving his child forward.  He wants to improve in his work, and he also wants to expand the carpentry business.  The member is asking for the loan to buy an appliance for his home and to buy a television.

He is happy to have the loan and he promises to pay it back on time.

loans.use: to buy an appliance for his home and to buy a television.

loans.name: Miluska

texts.es:
Miluska es una persona amable, trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Miluska nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 37 años de edad. Actualmente, Miluska vive en la ciudad donde nació junto con su único hijo y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. 

Miluska se dedica a la venta de Vehículos. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Miluska requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa. Su anhelo de la socia es abrir un tienda de venta de artesanía y venta de ropa.
texts.en:
Miluska is a kind, hardworking and responsible person, and it is for those qualities that her friends invited her to participate in the "Chaska" communal bank, of the Arariwa Association.

Miluska tells us that she was born in the city of Cusco in the Cusco Province and Cusco Department (in Peru), and she is 37 years old.   She currently lives in the same city where she was born, together with her only son, and this is where she undertakes her economic activities.

Miluska works selling vehicles. She has been working in this business for four years now, and it is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

At this moment, Miluska is requesting a loan for maintenance on her house.  The desire of the member is to open a shop selling handicrafts and selling clothing.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house.

loans.name: Wilman

texts.en: Wilman is 24 years old and lives near the city of Ibarra. He describes himself as “a little bit fun” and works at making and selling bricks. When he was 15 years old, his father taught him how to make bricks. Now he and his older brother work the brick-making process from start to finish. Wilman reports that his business is going well and that he is seeking this loan to invest in more brick-making material and firewood. He notes that the most improved portion of his life since acquiring his first loan was the economic aspect. In the future, he dreams of having more businesses like a grocery store and a hardware store where he can sell his bricks and work in construction projects.

loans.use: to buy brick-making materials and firewood

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como Izcuchaca y Anta, ella lleva pantalones, chompas, blusas y chalinas, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y  terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, yeso y arena.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS” ("Women Entrepreneurs").  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is 55 years old and single, she has 5 children.  The member alternates her daily activities with the business of selling clothes.  She works independently, taking her wares to different places like Izcuchaca and Anta.  She sells pants, sweaters, blouses and scarves.  It is through this business that the member is able to move her children ahead in life. 

The member wants to improve and finish building her house. The member is requesting the loan to buy construction materials like cement, gypsum and sand.

The member is happy about the loan and agrees to comply with repayments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, gypsum and sand.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 52 years old and married with three children. Her children are 27, 28, and 30 years old and they no longer live with Dominga. Dominga runs a small grocery store that sells all types of necessities. In her store, she also sells food that she makes.


Dominga is asking for a $300 loan in order to buy food for her store such as chicken, corn, and flour. She will also buy potatoes and sausages to make a local Peruvian dish called salchipapas. Dominga is committed to improving her business with the help of the loan and promises to complete all payments on time.

loans.use: to buy different types of food for her store

loans.name: Gabi

texts.es: Gabi tiene 36 años, convive con Andrés, de 35 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Julisa, de 13 y Anderson de 10 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde las primera horas de la mañana Gaby, comienza la venta de productos de primera necesidad en un pequeño espacio que acondicionó en su casa, cuando termina su venta, ella se dirige a sus sembríos de arveja, papa y maíz, donde hace 15 años comenzó a dedicarse a la agricultura, y según menciona la va muy bien, pues ahora la calidad de sus productos son muy cotizados en el mercado central de Tarma. Según afirma el movimiento económico del mercado es muy bueno, por ello está planeando invertir en la venta de verduras al por mayor los días de feria que son miércoles, viernes y domingo. Y como presidenta de su banco comunal, se siente dichosa de ayudar a las personas a salir adelante, ya que se siente agradecida con MFP, por lograr expandir su negocio y motivarla a seguir avanzando. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr sus objetivos, asimismo se compromete en cumplir con puntualidad sus cuotas. Gabi de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en completar la compra de 5 sacos de semilla de arveja.
texts.en:
Gabi is 36 years old and lives with Andrew, 35.  They have two children: Julisa, aged 13 and Anderson, aged 10.  They live together as a family in their own home, which is located in the hamlet of Cumutay. 

From the earliest hours of the morning, Gabi begins selling staples in a small space set aside in her home.  When she finishes selling, she turns to her crops of peas, potatoes and corn.  She has been working in agriculture for the last 15 years, and as she tells us, it's going great, because now the quality of her products is talked about in the central market of Tarma. 

As stated by her, the financial situation in the market is very good, so she is planning to invest in the sale of vegetables at wholesale.  Market days are Wednesday, Friday and Sunday.  And as president of her village bank, she feels lucky to help people get ahead in life, and as is grateful to MFP for being able to expand her business and for motivating her to further progress. 

She belongs to the communal bank “Pioneros de Cumutay” ("Cumutay Pioneers"), and this is her ninth loan through MFP.  She hopes for the support of all of you to achieve her goals, and she also agrees to comply punctually with her repayments.  Gabi, having gained your support, will invest the requested money to complete her purchase of 5 sacks of pea seeds.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of pea seeds.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa comenzó a trabajar independiente, vendiendo telas, zapatos y bolsos, pues  a ella siempre le ha gustado ser independiente y manejar su propio dinero; su clientela la constituyen sus vecinas del barrio y las amistades más allegadas quienes gradualmente le recomiendan muchas otras, con las que ha logrado un ligero incremento de nuevos compradores. Los activos de su negocio están representados más que todo  en cuentas por cobrar que rotan cada 14 días y en sus inventarios; aunque  maneja una buena rentabilidad  sobre los  activos,  no tiene un suficiente capital de trabajo para responder a los pedidos de su clientela, este es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una vitrina, suéteres para damas, jeans, camisas de hombre, bolsos, cremas, estuches de aretes, collares y vestidos, encargados por los clientes.
Rosa vive en la ciudad de Cartagena con su cónyuge y tiene 5 hijos en las edades de 15 a 30 años.  Aunque desde hace 23 años inició su negocio, ella suspendió su actividad con sus últimos embarazos, regresando a ella cuando sus hijos crecieron; ahora su clientela es referida por ellos mismos y está en un notable crecimiento. Su principal meta es el fortalecimiento de su negocio, por eso necesita tener una vitrina exhibidora, para mantenerlo más ordenado y poder mostrar de manera precisa los productos que vende;  su actual desafío es el insuficiente capital de trabajo, para abastecer a su clientela y tenerla siempre satisfecha y lograr su fidelidad.
texts.en:
Rosa started working independently selling fabric, shoes and bags as she has always liked working independently and managing her own money.  Her customers were her neighbors and her closest friends who have gradually recommended her to a lot more people.  As a result, she has managed to achieve a slight increase in new customers.  Her business assets are represented more than anything in her accounts receivable which have a turnover period of 14 days, and in her inventory.  Although she has a good profit margin, she doesn't have enough working capital to respond to her customers' orders.  This is why she is requesting a Kiva loan which is her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use it to buy a display cabinet, ladies' sweaters, jeans, men's shirts, bags, creams, earring cases, necklaces and dresses which her customer have ordered.

Rosa lives in the city of Cartagena with her husband.  They have five children aged between 15 and 30.  Although she started her business when she was 23 years old, Rosa put her business on hold during her most recent pregnancies and returned to work when her children had grown.  Now her existing customers refer new customers to her and her customer base is growing notably. 

Rosa's main goal is to strengthen her business.  For this reason, she needs to have a display cabinet so that she can keep her merchandise more ordered and be able to better display the products that she sells.  Her current challenge is a lack of working capital that she needs to supply her customers, to keep them happy and to keep their loyalty.

loans.use: to buy a display cabinet, ladies' sweaters, jeans, men's shirts, bags, creams, earring cases, necklaces and dresses that her customers have ordered

loans.name: Duo Los Olivos 2 Group

texts.es: El Dúo, los olivos, está formando por doña Herminia de 38 años, y Dominga  de 40 años, doña Herminia es casada tiene dos hijos  los dos estudian su esposo trabaja como chofer de buses. Ella es la lider de este grupo ella vende sandalias, blusas típicas y suertes , inicio su negocio hace dos años con el apoyo económico de su esposo, ella obtiene buenas ganancias ya que su negocio está en buen punto, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa tipica, Dominga , madre soltera tiene una hija ella se dedica a la cosecha rábanos,y maíz, necesita capital para comprar abono y semillas. Ambas desean sacar adelante a sus hijos y tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
The 'Los Olivos' group has two members: 38 year-old Herminia and 40 year-old Dominga.  Herminia is married and has two children who are in school.  Her husband is a bus driver.  She is the leader of this group.  Herminia sells sandals, traditional blouses and sweaters.  She started her business two years ago with the financial support of her husband.  She makes good profits as her business is in a good location.  She is requesting this loan to buy traditional clothing.

Dominga is a single mother with one daughter.  She grows radishes and corn, and needs capital to buy manure and seeds.  Both these ladies would like to get their children ahead in life and provide them with a better future.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en una discoteca en el área de ropería, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 p.m hasta las 6:00 a.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere terminar de construir su terreno y hacer arreglar el terreno. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y para pagar a los maestros de construcción.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) communal bank located in Cusco District that belongs to Cusco Province and Department.

She is 34 years old and has a spouse and two children.  She alternates her daily chores with working in the coat check service at a discotheque; she works from 7pm until 6am.  She is able to support her children with this job.  She’d like to finish building her property and do some improvements to it.  She’s asking for the loan to buy building materials and to pay labor costs for the builders.

She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco Antonio es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Marco Antonio nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Callo (Callo, Perú) y tiene 38 años de edad. Actualmente, Marco Antonio vive en la ciudad del Cusco y tiene cuatro hijos y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. 
Marco Antonio es promotor de venta de productos naturales y también se dedica a la venta de ropa. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Marco Antonio requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería ósea productos naturales.
texts.en:
Marco Antonio is a hard working, responsable person.  These qualities led his fellow members to invite him to join Asociación Arariwa’s “Chaska” communal bank.

Marco Antonio tells us that he was born in the city of Callo (Callo, Perú) and he’s 38 years old.  He lives in the city of Cusco which is where he carries out his economic activities at present and has four children.

Marco Antonio sells natural products and also sells clothes.  He’s been in this business for four years now and does very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  On this occasion, Marco Antonio needs the loan to buy merchandise, that is, natural products.

loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 29 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella vende perfumes, cremas, lápiz labiales y esmaltes de uñas, ella vende en forma independiente desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "Mujeres Emprendedoras" ("Enterprising Women") communal bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.  

The member is 29 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling beauty products.  She sells perfumes, creams, lipsticks, and nail polish independently from 9:00am until 7:00pm.  She wants to expand and improve the business.  She is asking for a loan to purchase wholesale beauty products.

The member is happy to have the loan and promises to pay it back on time.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene 45 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche entre otros productos, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) communal bank located in Cusco District that belongs to Cusco Province and Department.

She is 45 years old, married and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with running a grocery store.  She sells basic need items like: rice, sugar, oil and milk, among other products.  She works from 6am until 9pm.  She is able to support her children through this business.  She wants to expand the grocery store.  She needs the loan to buy such products like rice, sugar, milk and noodles at wholesale.

She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store at wholesale.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es: Jesús Antonio es un padre de familia que tiene 48 años vive con su esposa. El se dedica a la venta de hot dog y gaseosas. Realiza este medio de vida desde hace más de 9 años,  ya que la ubicación es muy favorable pues se encuentra en un centro de salud, en donde llegan a comprarle las personas de este lugar. La experiencia la obtuvo por que anteriormente él era cocinero con estas habilidades decide establecer su negocio. Jesús está solicitando un préstamo a para poder invertir en la compra de pan, bolsas, platos desechables, vasos, refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, carne entre otros.
texts.en: Jesús Antonio, 48, is a father living with his wife.  He sells hotdogs and soft drinks.  He’s been in this line of work for over nine years because his location is very favorable since it’s located at a health center where people from there come by to buy from him.  He gained experience because he used to work as a cook and then decided to open his own business.  Jesús is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of bread, bags, disposable plates, drinking glasses, beverages, soft drinks, juices and meat, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 43 años, convive con Alejandro de 46 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos: Denis, de 19 y Adeliz, de 18 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. El trabajo de está laboriosa mujer es la agricultura, donde siembra papa, arveja y maíz, ya tiene 32 años dedicándose a esto, y según afirma le gusta mucho compartir momentos de dificultades y alegrías junto a su familia, ya que juntos se dirigen los fines de semana a limpiar, fertilizar  y cosechar sus cultivos. En tanto que los demás días de la semana se dedica al cuidado de su tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, ya es conocida entre todo los pobladores del caserío, pues ofrece una variedad de productos necesarios para los alimentos del día. Asimismo su esposo se dedica al trasporte público dentro de la localidad. Ahora Rosa tiene sembrado arveja y papa que dentro de estos meses cosechará, y por lo que cuenta obtendrá buenas ganancias ya que el precio de venta subió en el mercado. Y como secretaría de su banco comunal se siente agradecida por ejercer un cargo dentro de su asociación. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de Cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para concretar sus planes. Además le gusta el trabajo de su banco comunal por ello se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente. Rosa de obtener su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja, semilla de gladiolo y varios sacos de abono orgánico para empezar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43, lives with Alejandro, 46.  They have three children but only two of them, Denis, 19, and Adeliz, 18, still live with them together as a family in their own house located in Cumutay.  

This hard working woman’s work is farming.  She grows potatoes, peas and corn.  She’s been in this line of work for 32 years and, according to her, she likes to share moments of difficulty and joy with her family very much because on weekends they all go to weed, fertilize and harvest their crops together.  The rest of the week she tends to her grocery store where she sells basic need items.  She is well known among the settlement’s residents because she stocks a variety of products needed for daily meal preparation.  In addition, her husband works providing public transportation services within the locality.

Currently, Rosa has peas and potatoes planted which will be harvested in the upcoming months and she states that profits will be good because market price has risen.  

As Secretary of her communal bank she feels grateful to carry out this job within her association.  She’s a member of the “Pioneros de Cumutay” (Cumutay Pioneers) communal bank and this is the 9th loan with MFP where she hopes for your cooperation to make her plans come about.  Besides, she enjoys her communal bank’s work and because of that she commits to make her installment payments on time.

If Rosa were to receive your support, she will invest the requested money in the purchase of two sacks of pea seeds, gladioli seeds and several sacks of manure to start her next planting successfully.

loans.use: to buy two bags of pea seeds, gladioli and several sacks of manure.

loans.name: Clencia

texts.en:
Clencia is 45 years old and has a partner that she lives with. She has two children who are 17 and 7 years old. Clencia has a business selling various crafts in Ollantaytambo, a small town that receives many tourists. 

She is asking for a 100 PEN loan to buy crafts and other souvenirs to sell such as colorful blankets, briefcases, and paintings. She is very happy to receive the loan and is committed to making all payments on time.

loans.use: to buy crafts to sell to tourists

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda tiene 43 años, está casada con Samuel, de 47 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo vive con 4 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Está luchadora mujer se dedica a la agricultura. Junto a su hijo Wilder, se dirigen todas las mañanas a sus cultivos de arveja, papa y maíz; donde trabajan arduamente desde al amanecer hasta el anochecer.  Lo que más le gusta a Nilda, es cuidar de sus animales como vacas, toros, cerdos y ovejas. Ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a ello, y afirma que a pesar de los inconvenientes que se suscitan constantemente, como en temporadas de lluvia, cuando aparece la enfermedad denominada  “la rancha”, termina por malograr los sembríos. Pese a ello,  tiene mucha fe y ganas de trabajar, ya que el campo “es su vida”, ahí nació y creció.  Por ello más adelante desea construir una casa más segura donde pueda vivir y poner un negocio propio. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Pioneros de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño apoyo económico para continuar con sus objetivos. Además se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Nilda de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja para su próxima siembra, además de varios sacos de abono orgánico para comenzar con éxito la temporada de sembrío.
texts.en:
Nilda, 43, is married to Samuel, 47.  They have five children but only four of them still live at home; the family lives together in their own house located in Cumutay.

This hard working woman farms.  Together with her son, Wilder, she heads out every morning to tend to her pea, potato and corn crops.  They work hard from sunrise to sunset.  What Nilda enjoys the most is caring for her livestock: cows, bulls, pigs and sheep.  She’s been in this occupation for 20 years and she affirms that despite the inconveniences that constantly arise, like the rainy season when a disease called “la rancha” appears that damages crops.  Despite this, she keeps faith and the desire to work because working in the fields “is her life;” this is where she was born and grew up.  Later on, she’d like to build a more secure house where she can live and open a business of her own.

She belongs to the “Pioneros de Cumutay” (Cumutay Pioneers) communal bank and this is the 9th loan with MFP where she’s hoping for a small economic assistance to continue toward her objectives.  In addition, she commits to pay her installments punctually.

If Nilda were to obtain your support, she will invest the requested money in the purchase of two bags of pea seeds for her next planting as well as several sacks of manure to begin the planting season successfully.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of pea seeds and sacks of manure.

loans.name: Yorlenis Leticia

texts.es: La Joven Yorlenis desde hace 3 años labora en su pequeño negocio venta de comida, actividad que ha sido su principal fuente de ingreso la que le ha servido para sastifacer sus necesidades, necesita este financiamiento para incrementar la venta ya que la demenda es buena y ella  no cuenta con los recursos economicos necesarios para realizar dicha obra, tambien podra incrementar la venta de recarga electronica, esta actividad la realiza en conjunto con su mama, en su comunidad la consideran como una joven  trabajadora, progresiva, responsable y de buenas costumbres.
texts.en: For the last three years, the young Yorlenis has worked in her small business selling food. This business has been her main source of income and it has been able to take care of her needs. She needs this loan in order to increase her sales since the demand is high. She doesn’t have the economic resources necessary to do this. In addition, she can increase the sales of phone recharging.  She works with her mother in this business. In her community, Yorlenis is considered a young, progressive, responsible hard-worker with good manners.

loans.use: buy products for her business.

loans.name: Benicia

texts.en: Benicia is 66 years old and is married with five children. Her children are 26, 29, 32, 34, and 37 years old and have moved out of the house. Benicia has a business selling crafts that are typical of Peru. She is asking for a $300 loan to buy a wider range of crafts to sell such as blankets, pottery, knitted hats, and satchels. She desires the loan in order to expand her business and is committed to making all the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy crafts to sell

loans.name: Clara Maria

texts.es: Clara Maria tiene 35 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su familia. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como pantalones, cosméticos, calzado y otros productos.  La mayoría de sus clientes siempre le solicitan variedad, por lo que ella tiene que buscar la forma de complacerlos. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de esta materia. Clara es una mujer muy alegre y disfruta de realizar esta actividad cada día.
texts.en: Clara María is 35 years old.  She is a very hard working woman who very much wants to move her family forward.  She sells general merchandise like pants, cosmetics, footwear and other products.  Most of her customers always request variety so she must find ways to please them.  Because of this she’s asking for this loan to buy this merchandise.  Clara is a very cheerful woman who enjoys doing this work every day.

loans.use: to buy pants, cosmetics, footwear and other products.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es: Alberto natural de la ciudad de Kimbiri, tiene 42 años de edad, convive con Gladis de 33 años y fruto de su relación concibieron 03 hijos a quienes desea brindarle una educación justa para que mañana mas tarde sean hombres de provecho. Alberto es un hombre centrado y con muchas responsabilidades que cumplir para el bien de su familia, por ello se despierta  muy temprano para dirigirse a su centro de labor y abrir las puertas de su negocio en espera de sus primeros consumidores. Desde sus 21 años viene dedicándose a la de venta de productos de primera necesidad, tales como arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes,   entre otros. Se siente muy contento en su puesto de trabajo, por que gracias a su puesto de ventas, construyó su propia casa y con ello también sustenta los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Su  puesto de ventas se sitúa en la ciudad de Kimbiri y es muy concurrido por su clientela. Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado, llevará acabo uno de sus deseos como es el de comprar una moto carguero para así atender pedidos y distribuir la mercadería a domicilios. Espera contar con el apoyo económico para poder prestar un buen servicio a sus consumidores exigentes. Este será su 11avo crédito con MFP y ya se siente muy contento al saber que en esta oportunidad también contará con el apoyo de todos ustedes, para llevar consigo su propósito, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas puntualmente como solía hacer en los anteriores créditos. Con los 2,000 mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará una moto carguero.
texts.en:
Alberto is from the city of Kimbiri. He is 42 years old. He lives with Gladis who is 33 years old. They have three children and want to provide them with a good education so that later on they will be good men.
Alberto is a balanced man and he has many responsibilities to fulfill for his family. He wakes up very early in order to get to his place of work and to open the doors of his business for the first customers. For 21 years, he has sold basic necessity products like rice, sugar, pasta, detergent and other items. He is very happy with his business. Thanks to his position, he has built his own house and also he is able to keep up with the educational expenses for his dear children. His stand is located in the city of Kimbiri and it is popular with his customers. With the assistance from the requested loan, he will be able achieve one of his dreams to purchase a cargo motorcycle so he can take orders and deliver merchandise to homes. He hopes he can count on the economic support in order to provide his demanding clients with good service. This with be his 11th loan with MFP. He feels very happy to know that this opportunity is possible with the support of all of you so he can reach his intention. In addition, he promises to make his payments on time like he has done with his previous loans. With the requested 2,000 Nuevos Soles, he will buy a cargo motorcycle.

loans.use: buy a cargo motorcycle.

loans.name: Luis Wilhelm

texts.es:
Luis Wilhelm es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Luis Wilhelm nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 32 años de edad. Actualmente, Luis Wilhelm vive en la ciudad donde nació y tiene un hijo y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. 

Luis Wilhelm se dedica a desarrolla eventos culturales y sociales, él ahora va realiza el evento de moda “Miss Glamour”. El también tiene un pequeño negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de comida. Ya son varios años que se dedican a la venta de comida y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que ponen en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Luis Wilhelm requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Luis Wilhelm is a hard working, responsible person. It was because he has these qualities that his neighbours invited him to become part of the "Chaska" communal bank, which is part of the Arariwa Association.

Luis Wilhelm was born in the city of Cusco (Peru), and is 32 years old. He lives in the city he was born in, where he has a son, and where he works. He dedicates his time to organising cultural and social events; at the moment he is pulling together a fashion event called "Miss Glamour". He also has a small family business selling food. The family have been selling food for several years now and the business is going well, thanks to the hard work they put in. Luis Wilhelm requires the loan to buy supplies such as rice, sugar, noodles, and other things.

loans.use: To buy ingredients, for example rice, sugar, noodles and other things.

loans.name: Josias

texts.es: Josias es  natural de la ciudad de Kimbiri, tiene 73 años, es un hombre sociable, argumenta que por motivos personales llegó a separarse de su pareja y por ello esta a cargo de cubrir los gastos de  educación de su menor hijo Josias de 22 años, ambos viven en su propia morada. Josias es un hombre de valor y perseverancia no se amilanó ante los problemas que pasó, al contrario tuvo el valor de superar y sobre salir adelante con el apoyo de su menor hijo. Gracias al esfuerzo de su juventud construyó su propia casa de 03 pisos situada en el distrito de Kimbiri, donde hoy solo le queda las fuerzas para administrar  los cuartos que ocupan sus arrendatarios y con ello cubre los gastos de educación de su hijo, pero el dinero no cubre todas sus necesidades por eso acude a los prestamos para llevar consigo el mejoramiento de las fachadas de su vivienda y así brindar una buena comodidad a sus ocupantes. Para la tranquilidad de sus años posteriores solo desea brindar buenas habitaciones a sus inquilinos ya que de eso dependerá el buen ingreso de su economía. Este será su décimo crédito y esta muy contento de trabajar con MFP a la vez espera el apoyo de todos ustedes, que contará una vez mas con el apoyo para llevar consigo el propósito de mejorar las habitaciones de su morada. Con los 1500 nuevos soles que solicita, le servirá para la compra de materiales como pintura, selladores y rodillo.
texts.en:
Josías is from the city of Kimbiri.  He’s 73 years old.  He is a sociable man.  He relates that due to personal reasons he separated from his wife and because of this he’s in charge of covering education costs for his youngest son, Josías, 22.  The two of them live in their own house. Josías is a brave, persevering man who was not discouraged by the problems he went through.  On the contrary, he had the valor to overcome and continue forward with help from his youngest son.  

Thanks to the efforts of his youth, he managed to build a three story house located in Kimbiri District.  Today, he only has strength enough left to manage the rooms his tenants rent and uses profits from that to pay for his son’s education.  However, the money doesn’t suffice to meet all his needs so this is why he depends on loans to carry out improvements to his dwelling in order to provide more comfort for its occupants.

In order to have more peace of mind in his later years, all he wants to do is provide good accommodations for his tenants since that is what good income for him depends on.  This will be his 10th loan with MFP.  He hopes to get support from all of you to once again have the support he needs to improve the rooms in his house.  He will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy supplies like paint, sealants and a paint roller.

loans.use: to buy paint, sealants and a roller.

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es: Doña Eduarda desde hace 3 años realiza la actividad de compra y venta de cerdos, la cual se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos para la manutencion y el bienestar economico de su familia, dicha actividad la realiza en conjunto con su esposo, necesita de este financiamiento porque no cuenta con los recursos economicos necesarios para sastifacer la demanda de sus clientes, esto le permitira incrementar el volumen de compra y asi poder mejorar su nivel de ganancia, en su comunidad la consideran como una mujer trabajadora y responsable con muchos deseos de superacion
texts.en:
Ms. Eduarda has been buying and selling pigs for three years. It has become her principal source of income for supporting and providing for the economic well-being of her family. She does this work together with her husband.

She needs this loan because she does not have the economic resources needed to satisfy her customers' demands. This loan will allow her to increase her purchase volume and thereby improve her earnings.

In her community, Eduarda is considered to be a hard-working and responsible woman with a great desire to improve her situation.

loans.use: to buy and sell more pigs

loans.name: Miguel Christian

texts.es:
Miguel Christian es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Miguel Christian nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 18 años de edad. Actualmente, Miguel Christian vive en la ciudad donde nació y tiene un hijo y donde desarrolla sus actividades. 

Miguel Christian es estudia la carrera profesional de Turismo en la Universidad Particular Austral en la ciudad del Cusco y está cursando el sexto semestre. En esta oportunidad Miguel Christian requiere el préstamo para pagar sus matriculas y otras cosas.
texts.en:
Miguel Christian is a hard-working and responsible person, and because of these qualities, he was invited to participate in the "Chaska" communal bank of Asociación Arariwa.

He tells Asociación Arariwa that he was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and that he is 18 years old. Currently, Miguel Christian lives in the same city where he was born and he has one son.

Miguel Christian is studying tourism at Austral University in the city of Cusco. He is in his sixth semester. At this moment, Miguel Christian needs a loan to pay for his tuition and other things.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition and other expenses

loans.name: Valeria

texts.es: Doña Valeria desde hace 4 años tiene establecida su pequeña Pulperia donde ofrece productos basicos y necesarios en todo hogar, necesita este financiamiento para ampliar la venta de productos y poder sastifacer la demanda de sus clientes permitiendole mejorar las fuentes de ingreso a nivel familiar, su familia es muy unida los que en conjunto trabajan para al bienestar comun, colaboran en los quehaceres de su pulperia, es importante mencionar que tambien trabaja en su unidad de produccion atendiendo su pequeño inventario ganadero, sus vecinos la recomiendan como una persona responsable, honesta y de buenas costunbres.
texts.en: Ms. Valeria started her small pulpería [grocery store] four years ago, where she offers basic products that are necessary in every home. She needs this loan to increase her sales and to be able to satisfy her customers' demands. This will allow her to improve her family's level of income. Her family is very close and they work together for their common good. For instance, they work together on the tasks at her pulpería. It is important to mention that they also work together to tend to their small herd of cattle. Valeria's neighbors recommend her as a responsible and honest person with good habits.

loans.use: to buy more products for her store

loans.name: Genoveva

texts.en: Genoveva is 43 years old and married with two children. Her children are 21 and 15 years old. She is an independent merchant with her own store. However, Genoveva is asking for the loan in order to pay for construction on her house, which she is planning on turning into a small hotel. With her loan, she will pay for the construction of windows, doors, and other additions to her house. She plans on having 10 rooms in her hotel, each with private bathrooms. Genoveva is happy for the loan in order to start her new business and is committed to making the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for construction of a hotel

loans.name: Nedy

texts.es: Nedy es natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, tiene 23 años, convive con Fredy de 25 años y fruto de esa unión concibieron 03 hijos, a quienes desea brindarle una buena comodidad. Nedy, es una mujer muy laboriosa, con su puesto de ventas trata de sobresalir adelante. Ella es comerciante y tiene un negocio de venta de abarrotes situado en la avenida principal de su ciudad. Es así que su tienda es muy frecuentado por sus clientes, ya que ella les brinda buen trato, apertura las puertas de su negocio desde tempranas horas y están listas para recibir a sus primeros compradores, sabiendo de la variedad de la mercadería que tiene en su bodega no dudan en comprarle, ya que tienen la certeza de encontrar los productos indicados para sus necesidades. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes ya que es una de sus habilidades que emplea para ganar mayor cantidad de consumidores. Lleva 02años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es permanecer de pie casi todo el transcurso del día. Con el crédito solicitado comprará más víveres para su negocio y así abastecerse de mercadería. Con el tiempo piensa incrementar sus ganancias ampliando su tienda. Este será su tercer crédito, por ello espera de la colaboración de todos ustedes para poder comprar los víveres, a la vez se compromete en pagar puntualmente sus aportes. En su banco comunal es muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras. Con el monto solicitado comprará víveres como sacos de arroz, fideos, azúcar y conservas.
texts.en:
Nedy is from the city of Quimbiri.  She is 23 years old and lives with 25 year-old Fredy.  The couple have three children who they would like to provide with more comfort in life.

Nedy is a very hard-working woman who is trying to make progress with her sales business.  She is a saleswoman and has a business selling groceries which is located on the main avenue of her city.  Her store is very busy with customers as she treats them well.  She opens her doors very early each morning and is ready greet her first customers of the day.  As they are aware of the variety of merchandise that she has in her store, they don't hesitate to buy from her.  They can be certain that they will find the products they need.

What Nedy most enjoys about her work is chatting to her customers.  This is one of the skills that she uses to gain more customers.  She has been in this business for two years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to stay on her feet nearly all day long.  

Nedy will use the loan she has requested to buy more food products for her business, so that she can stock it with merchandise.  Over time, she plans to increase her profits by expanding her store.  This will be her third loan and she hopes to receive the cooperation of each and every one of you so that she can buy the food products she needs.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  Nedy is a very well-liked member of her community bank.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy food products such as bags of rice, noodles, sugar and canned goods.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles and canned goods

loans.name: Vilma Dominga

texts.es: Doña Vilma Dominga desde hace 3 años realiza esta actividad de compra y venta de cosmeticos requiere de este financiamiento para imcrementar la oferta de productos a sus clientes y que sus ganancias sean mucho mayor, es importante mencionar que tambien trabaja de costurera en su localidad donde habita lo que le permite garantizar ingresos extra aparte de su negocio, su esposo tambien trabaja realizando actividades agricolas los que en conjunto colaboran en los gastos del hogar,  sus vecinos la recomiendan como una persona responsable, honesta y de buenas costunbres.
texts.en: Vilma Dominga has been a cosmetics merchant for the last three years.  She needs this financing to increase her stock of products to offer customers and so that her profits will be much greater.  It’s important to mention that she also has a job as a seamstress in the location where she lives that allows her to have guaranteed income beside what she gets from her business.  Her husband is also employed doing farming tasks.  They both contribute to household expenses together.  Her neighbors recommend her as being a responsible, honest person who has good habits.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Ursula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ursula; la socia tiene 40 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 3 hijos 18, 10, 3 mees de edad; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de desayunos; la socia prepara los desayunos todos los días y muy temprano por las mañanas y se dirige a la esquina de sus casa con una mesa pequeña para apoyar la jarra de quinua con manzana y leche evaporada, y queques de naranja; también lleva una silla de platico para los clientes, servilletas y un balde con agua para los vasos; la socia vende quinua con manzana hervida y leche y también maca, estos son desayunos con muchas proteínas y muy famosos en la ciudad; la socia desea el crédito para comprar insumos para su negocio la socia comprara a quinua, manzanas, y vasos para implementar su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos y vasos para su negocio.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Nueva Generación II” (New Generation II) communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.

The member is Ursula, 40.  She has a spouse and three children who are 18 and 10 years and 3 months of age.  She is a merchant selling breakfasts.  She prepares breakfasts very early every morning and then heads out to the corner by her house with a small table to hold a jug of quinoa with apples and evaporated milk as well as orange cakes.  She also takes a plastic chair for customers, napkins and a bucket of water for the glasses.  She sells quinoa boiled with apples, milk and maca (a medicinal herb).  These breakfasts are high in protein and very famous in the city.  She wants the loan to buy ingredients for her business.  She will buy quinoa, apples and drinking glasses to stock the business.  She’s asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of supplies and drinking glasses for her business.

She is grateful for the support granted her and commits to meet her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and drinking glasses.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.en: Ana Maria is 55 years old and a single mother of two children. Her daughters are 28 and 14 years old. Ana Maria works in agriculture growing corn and other vegetables. She has not been making very good profits from her crops this year. As a result, she is looking to expand the range of crops she sells by purchasing seeds and other materials for raising crops. Ana Maria is a hard working and responsible woman who promises to complete all the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seed and materials for raising crops

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Sonia nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 35 años de edad. Actualmente, Sonia vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y tiene cuatro hijos y donde desarrolla sus actividades. Sonia tiene pequeña tienda denominada “Multiservicios Sonia” y está ubicada en el centro histórico de la ciudad Imperial del Cusco. Los servicios que ofrece son; venta de paquetes turísticas, locutorio, internet y revelado de fotografías. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar computadoras. Su sueño de la socia es construir su casa. (Ella en la fotografía está acompañada de su esposo y una de sus hijas).
texts.en:
Sonia is a hard-working and responsible person.  Owing to these personal qualities, her friends invited her to join Asociación Arariwa's 'Chaska' community bank.

Sonia tells us that she was born in the city of Cusco (Peru).  She is 35 years old and currently lives in the same city in which she was born.  This is also where she carries out her business activities.  She has four children.

Sonia has a small store called "Mutiservicios Sonia" which is located in the historic center of the Imperial City of Cusco.  The services that she offers are selling tourist packages, offering a public phone service, offering internet services and developing photos.  She has been in this business for several years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

On this occasion, Sonia needs a loan to buy computers.  Her dream is to build a house.  In the photo she is accompanied by her husband and one of her daughters.

loans.use: to buy computers

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elva; la socia tiene 37 años de edad, la socia es casado, La socia tiene 2 hijos 7, 1 y medio años de edad; La socia es docente de profesión la socia labora en la provincia de Paucartambo, ella trabaja con sus propios recursos en cuanto a la compra de materiales didácticos que ella misma se provee para demostraciones, la socia  desea invertir el crédito en la compra de  1 libro didáctico y de materiales para este trimestre del año.  La socia es docente de secundaria. La socia desea el crédito para poder comprar materiales para elaborar actividades en grupo y 1 libro.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Elva is a member of the "Nueva Generación III" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province and department.

Elva is 37 years old, married, and has two children aged 7 and 18 months.  She is a teacher by profession and works in Paucartambo province.  She works with her own resources.  When it comes to giving demonstrations, she buys and provides the materials herself.  She would like to invest her loan in buying one educational book and materials for this term (semester).  She is a high school teacher.  She would like this loan to buy materials for preparing group activities, and one book.

Elva is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy materials for preparing group activities, and one book

loans.name: Benji

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Benji; el socio tiene 18 años de edad, el socio es soltero, el socio trabaja y estudia, el socio está trabajando en la distribuidora de bebidas Coca-Cola, el socio esta en el área de preventas; el socio alterna su trabajo con los estudios actualmente el socio está estudiando idiomas en el centro de idiomas Ipcna, el socio está estudiando ingles; El desea continuar sus estudios y pagar la universidad está pensando entre dos carreras que aún está madurando la idea según a las ofertas y demandas de nuestro país en los próximos años. El socio desea el crédito para invertiré en sus estudios, el desea pagar su  ciclo y comprar sus libros de lectura y actividades. El socio invertirá en sus estudios.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Nueva Generación III" ["New Generation III"] communal bank, which is located in the district of Huanchac, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower, Benji, is 18 years old and single. He works and goes to school. He works in pre-sales at a distribution center for Coca-Cola beverages. He alternates his work with his studies. He is currently studying languages at the Ipcna language center. He is studying English and would like to continue his studies and to be able to pay for university. He is deciding between two majors, as he is still developing his ideas according to the opportunities and demands of his country over the coming years. Benji would like a loan to invest in his studies. He would like to pay tuition for this cycle and to pay for class books and activities. He will invest in his education.

Benji is grateful for the support being offered to him and he promises to be disciplined in his compliance with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to pay for his studies

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca is 42 years old and married with four children. Her children are 4, 13, 19, and 21 years old. Francisca has a store in which she sells various crafts. She is asking for a $300 loan in order to add to the crafts that she is already selling. She plans to buy backpacks, briefcases and shawls with the loan. Francisca is committed to expanding her business and promises to make all of the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy crafts to sell at her store.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
Fortunata es una persona trabajadora y responsable que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Chaska” de la Asociación Arariwa.

Fortunata nos cuenta que nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 67 años de edad. Actualmente, Fortunata vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y tiene dos hijos y donde desarrolla sus actividades. Fortunata es cesante de educación pero ahora se dedica  a hacer manualidades ósea teja chompas para niños, bebes, damas y caballeros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como lana, hilos y otras más.
texts.en:
Fortunata's peers invited her to participate in Asociación Arariwa's "Chaska" communal bank because of her qualities as a hard-working and responsible person.

Fortunata tells Asociación Arariwa that she was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and is 67 years old. Currently, she lives and works in the same city where she was born and has two children. Fortunata used to work in education but now works making handicrafts such as knit sweaters for children, babies, women, and men. She has been doing this work for several years and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

At this time, she needs a loan to buy wool, thread, and other materials.

loans.use: to buy materials like wool and thread

loans.name: Nohemi

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nohemi; la socia tiene 46 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 3 hijos 21, 15, 4 años de edad; La socia  alterna sus actividades con el comercio minorista; la socia es docente de profesión; por ahora la socia se dedica a las cobranzas; la socia trabaja junto a su pareja  en su molinera;  su conyugue se dedica a moler diferentes granos y ella hace las cobranzas a las diferentes empresas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de maíz, de diferentes tipos y molerlos para hacer harinas de maíz (polenta).

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Nueva Generación III" ["New Generation III"] communal bank, which can be found in the district of Huanchac, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Nohemi. She is 46 years old and in a common-law marriage. She has three children, ages 21, 15, and 4 years old. She divides her time between her daily activities and her small business. Nohemi is a teacher by profession, but for now she makes collections for her and her partner's mill. Her partner grinds different grains and Nohemi goes to different businesses to make collections. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of different types of corn and to grind them to make corn meal (polenta).

She is grateful for the support being offered to her and promises to be disciplined in her compliance with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to purchase different types of corn

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hilda; la socia tiene 35 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, La socia tiene 3 hijos 13, 6, 2 años de edad; La socia se dedica al comercio minorista  la socia  se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras en el mercado cascaparo; la socia tiene que comprar verduras al por mayor cada semana de una señora que le provee; ella se hace dejar y va sumando a la cuenta para que a fines de mes ella pague lo que debe y vuelva a cargarse de mercadería para las semanas siguientes, La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de verduras y el pago a sus proveedora.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the "Nueva Generación III" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Hilda is 35 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children aged 13, 6 and 2.  She sells products retail.  She buys vegetables and sells them in Cascaparo market.  She has to buy vegetables wholesale each week from a lady who supplies her.  The supplier leaves the products with her and adds them to her account so that she can pay what she owes at the end of each month and stock up with more merchandise for the following weeks.  Hilda is requesting this loan to invest in buying vegetables and to pay her supplier.

Hilda is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and to pay her suppliers

loans.name: Lilliam Xiomara

texts.es: Lilliam  de 33 años de edad es casada, labora como docente  desde hace 8 años años consecutivos por encuentro, ademàs trabaja en su propio  negocio una clinica dental la que es bien reconocida en el Municipio, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien asume los gastos del hogar; esta solicitando crèdito para  terminar de pagar un solar  y de esta manera lograr su meta propuesta de tener su propia vivienda en el futuro. Lilliam se caracteriza por ser una mujer bien trabajadora y  muy  responsable, y en su comunidad la reconocen como una mujer luchadora y dedicada al trabajo y a su familia. su mayor sueño en la vida es que su familia permanezca unida y en los caminos de Dios.
texts.en:
Lilliam is 33 years old, married, and has been working as a teacher for eight consecutive years. She also works in her own business, a dental clinic that is well known in the municipality. She has the help of her husband, who takes on the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to finish paying for a plot of land, so that she can someday achieve her goal of having her own home.

Lilliam can be characterized as a very hard-working and responsible woman, and in her community, she is recognized as a woman who fights for and is dedicated to her family. Her greatest dream in life is that her family will remain united and stay on God's path.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Don Miguel, de 65 años, habita en Chacaraseca una comunidad ubicada en León, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos de 22,19 y 28 años respectivamente. El se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de ganado.
En 1984 el comenzó  trabajar por  cuenta propia a través de un prestamos las tierras en las que comenzó a trabajar le fueron donadas por el gobierno, fueron comienzo muy duros para el no contaba con las herramientas necesario comenzó sembrando 10 manzanas de algodón, el tenia solo una vaquita. Actualmente tiene 10 vacas, tiene tierras que compro con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificios, siembra hortalizas, como la yuca, sin dejar atrás el negocio de crianza de ganado.  
Solicito el préstamo para sembrar 4 manzanas de yuca , con la inversión espera sacar rentabilidad y calidad en su cosecha ,pues desea dejarles una buena herencia a sus hijos y sacar adelante su hija que esta estudiando enfermería que desea apoyarla hasta donde mas le pueda.
texts.en:
Miguel is 65 years old and lives in Chacaraseca, a community which is located in León.  He is married and has three children aged 22, 19 and 28.  He farms and raises livestock.

In 1984, Miguel started working for himself.  Through a loan, he started to work the land that was given to him by the government.  At first it was very hard because he didn't have the tools he needed.  He started growing 10 'manzanas' (one manzana = 1.68 acres) of cotton.  He only had one calf.  He currently has ten cows and land which he bought through a lot of hard work and sacrifice.  He sows vegetables such as cassava, without neglecting his livestock business.

Miguel requested this loan so that he could sow 4 'manzanas' (approx 6.7 acres) with cassava.  With this investment, he hopes to make a profit and obtain a good quality harvest.  He would like to be able to leave his children a good inheritance.  He would also like to get his daughter ahead in life.  She is studying to become a nurse and he would like support her as far as he can.

loans.use: to sow 4 'manzanas' (approx 6.7 acres) with cassava

loans.name: Onofrio

texts.es: Onofrio tiene 46 años, es un hombre alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Zenaida de 47 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 05 hijos, a quienes les viene brindando una educación justa. Onofrio es una de las personas con mucho ahínco que lucha por el mejor bienestar de su familia. Se dedica al transporte fluvial, en la que cuenta con bote de madera, que le sirve para transbordar personas y mercaderías a diversos lugares. Viene trabajando 21 años como motorista emergiendo su bote bajo las inmensas aguas del Río Apurimac. En la travesía lo acompaña un ayudante quien se encarga de medir con un asta la profundidad del agua. No se queja de su trabajo al contrario se siente  feliz  por el servicio que presta porque gracias a su trabajo paga la escolaridad de sus hijos y  a la vez compró tierras para  cultivar. Con el crédito solicitado comprará brea y esmalte para reparar su navío. Los planes que tiene en mente es adquirir otra canoa para poder alquilarlo y así obtener mejores ingresos económicos. Este es su 13avo crédito, por lo cual esta contento de saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de todos ustedes para seguir creciendo. En su banco comunal es un socio tratable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles lo empleará para comprar brea y esmalta para su navío.
texts.en:
Onofrio is 46 years old.  He is a cheerful and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 47 year-old Zenaida.  The couple have five children who they are providing with a decent education.

Onofrio is one of those people who have a lot of determination and work hard to improve their family's well-being.  He works in the river transport business, using his wooden boat to transport people and merchandise to different places.  He has been working in this business for 21 years, emerging his boat in the immense waters of the Apurimac river.  On his crossings, he is accompanied by an assistant who takes care of measuring the depth of the water with a pole.  He doesn't complain about his work.  On the contrary, he feels happy with the service that he provides because, thanks to his work, he is able to pay for his children's education and buy land to grow crops on.

Onofrio will use the loan he has requested to buy pitch and varnish to repair his boat.  The plan that he has in mind is to acquire another boat so that he can hire it out and thereby make better income.  This is his 13th loan from MFP and he is happy to know that he will once again have your support which will help him to continue growing.  Onofrio is an amiable member of his community bank.  He will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles to buy pitch and varnish for his boat.

loans.use: to buy pitch and varnish for his boat

loans.name: Lidia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Lidia Labora como docente de la Escuela Mauricio Cajina  desde ha ce 24 años desempeñandose con gran dedicaciòn y empeño,  cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien asume los gastos familiares. Esta solicitando financiamiento de su 4to credito para construccion de vivienda y asi brindarle mejor comodidad en su hogar. Todos lo dias doña Lidia se levanta a las 4 de la mañana para dejar hecho los quehaceres del hogar, para despues irse a enseñar el pan de la enseñanza, su mayor sueño en la vida es que su linda familia tengan un hogar lleno de paz y armonia.
texts.en: Ms. Lidia has worked as a teacher at the Mauricio Cajina school for 24 years, where she has put in great dedication and effort. She has the help of her husband, who takes care of the household expenses. She is requesting her fourth loan to perform construction on her house, in order to offer greater comfort in her home. Every day, Ms. Lidia gets up at 4 in the morning in order to complete her household chores, so that she can then go teach. Her greatest dream in life is for her beautiful family to have a home full of peace and harmony.

loans.use: to perform construction on her house

loans.name: Petronila

texts.en: Petronila is 74 years old and lives with her partner. She has five children who are 36, 38, 40, 42, and 46 years old. Petronila works three days a week selling soft drinks, water and other small things to eat at the site of the Incan ruins located in her town, Ollantaytambo. She is soliciting the loan in order to buy all types of soft drinks and water to sell to tourists who visit the ruins. Petronila is a very responsible woman and is committed to making all the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy refreshments to sell to tourists.

loans.name: Otilia

texts.es: Otilia de 56 años de edad, esta casada con Donato de 61 años y tienen 01 hijo llamado Michael de 22 años y juntos viven en su propia casa ubicada en el sector Huarmamayo perteneciente al distrito de Quimbiri. Otilia, es una señora entusiasta y enfocada en sus responsabilidades; se dedica al negocio de un Bar – Recreo con el nombre “La Choza” ubicada en el distrito de Quimbiri donde ofrece bebidas alcohólicas para el consumo de las personas mayores; igualmente ofrece platos típicos de la zona como: Tacacho con cecina, Juanes, entre otros. En su negocio cuenta con el apoyo de 03 señoritas que están dispuestas a brindar la buena comodidad a su público concurrente, viene trabajando 11 años en este negocio y esta agradecida por la preferencia de sus consumidores. Los fines de semana cuentan con mayor acogida de público, lo cual le genera mayores ingresos. Otilia acude una vez más a los préstamos que la institución concede a los mas necesitados con la finalidad de crecer e invertir el dinero en una utilidad. Los planes para el futuro  de su negocio es abrir una  nueva sucursal con el mismo nombre y en el mismo distrito en mención. Este será su octavo crédito y por lo cual necesita el apoyo de ustedes para seguir progresando, además se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas y esta agradecida por  pertenecer a su banco comunal. Con el monto solicitado renovará sus muebles deterioradas como mesas y sillas por nuevas.
texts.en:
Otilia is 56 years old and married to 61 year-old Donato.  They have one son called Michael who is 22 years old.  They live together in their own home which is located in Huarmamayo, in Quimbiri district.

Otilia is an enthusiastic woman who is focused on her responsibilities.  She runs a bar called "La Choza" which is located in Quimbiri district.  She sells alcoholic beverages to adults.  She also sells typical regional dishes such as 'tacacho con cecina' (roasted, mashed plantains with pork), 'juanes' (a chicken dish), etc.  In her business, she has the support of three young ladies who are willing to provide her public with good customer service.  She has been in this business for 11 years and is grateful for the loyalty of her customers.  More people come to her bar on weekends and so she makes more money then.  Otilia is, once again, taking out one of the loans that the institution offers those most in need with the goal of growing her business and investing the money in it.  Her future plan for her business is to open a new branch with the same name, in the same district.

This will be Otilia's eighth loan and she needs your support in order to continue making progress.  She pledges to make her repayments on time and is grateful that she belongs to her community bank.  She will use the money she has requested to replace her worn furniture such as tables and chairs with new ones.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Bismarck Antonio

texts.es: Bismarck de 30 años años de edad es casado, su esposa se encarga del cuido de sus hijos y de los quehaceres del hogar; Bismarck trabaja como guarda de seguridad desde hace varios años en el turno de la noche, ademas en el dia se dedica al cultivo de granos basico y de raices y tuberculos, lo cual le brinda ingresos adicionales que le permiten brindar mayor estabilidad a su familia. Esta solicitando su 5to crèdito para arreglar su vivienda ya que algunas paredes estan en mal estado y  asi tener mas comodidad y seguridad en el hogar. Su mayor sueño es seguir poco a poco mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda y gozar de salud y estabilidad laboral.
texts.en: Bismarck is 30 years old and married. His wife is in charge of caring for their children and the household chores. Bismarck has been working as a security guard on the night shift for several years. During the day, he grows basic grains, root vegetables, and tubers, which brings in additional income that allows him to offer his family greater stability. He is requesting his fifth loan to repair his house, as some of the walls are in bad shape. This way, his home will be more stable and safer. His greatest dream is to continue improving the infrastructure of his home little by little, and to enjoy good health and job stability.

loans.use: to make home repairs

loans.name: Nereyda

texts.es: Nereyda de 27 años de edad es casada,  trabaja como Farmaceutica de la casa de la mujer  desde hace 3 años, donde ha demostrado ser responsable y cumplida con sus compromisos, su esposo tiene un taxi propio de donde obtienen ingresos familiares que permiten solventar los gastos del hoga. Esta solicitando su 8vo crèdito para terminar de costruir una habitaciòn brindando de esta manera la comodidad que se merece a su familia, su mayor sueño es tener  mas privacidad en el hogar y seguir estudiando y que a sus hijos no les falte nada.
texts.en:
Nereyda is 27 years old and married.  She has been working as a pharmacist at a women's shelter for three years.  She has shown herself to be responsible and punctual in meeting her obligations.  Her husband owns his own taxi with which he makes family income that allows them to cover their household expenses.

Nereyda is requesting her eighth loan to finish building a room which will allow her to provide the comfort that her family deserves.  Her biggest dreams are to have privacy in her home, to continue studying and for her children not to want for anything.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: Sabina es natural D. la ciudad D. Quimbiri, tiene 51 años, es una mujer viuda que lucha por el mejor bienestar D. sus 02 queridos hijos a quienes les brinda un techo donD. pasan con tranquilidad sus días. Sus años no son impedimento para seguir luchando por el mejor bienestar D. sus hijos y D. si misma. Sabina es una mujer D. negocios y con muchas ganas D. seguir trabajando, se dedica al negocio D. verduras donD. ofrece variedad D. hortalizas como lechugas, ajos, apios, zanahorias. Su puesto D. ventas esta situado en el mercado del distrito D. Quimbiri donD. Viene trabajando 25 años continuos. Anteriormente vendía sus productos D. manera ambulante; desD. que la Municipalidad del distrito D. Quimbiri concluyó con la construcción del  mercado modelo gracias a ello  sabina y muchos comerciantes más hoy en día  ofrecen su mercadería cumpliendo con el reglamento D. las ordenanzas municipales. La venta D. verduras le genera buenas ganancias porque gracias a ello concluyo con el asfaltado D. su terreno. Pero el gasto D. educación D. sus hijos es mas granD., razón por la cual acuD. a los prestamos para que pueda implementar su negocio comprando variedad D. verduras. Su plan a futuro es comprar otro puesto donD. pueda vender productos D. primera necesidad y así depender D. dos ingresos.
